T02D1511:308b-1: shr'i samba ra mandala bi dhi:/
T02D1511:308b-3: dpal bde mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga / dpal 'khor lo bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1511:308b-4: nam mkha' las rgyas mkha' 'gro ma'i //
T02D1511:308b-5: 'khor lo sdom pa la btud nas //
T02D1511:308b-6: de yi dkyil 'khor sogs cho ga ;
T02D1511:308b-7: ; bla ma las rnyed bri bar bya //
T02D1511:308b-9: slob dpon g-yon na kha tv'am ga / h'um sgrogs g-yas na da ma ru //
T02D1511:308b-10: yang dag ye shes rgyud shes shing //
T02D1511:308b-11: he ru ka dpal gsang sngags zhes //
T02D1511:308b-12: khro med gtsang sbra brtson 'grus ldan //
T02D1511:308b-13: sbyor shes ye shes pha rol son //
T02D1511:308b-14: mgo skyes la ni thod pas brgyan //
T02D1511:308b-15: thal ba yis ni lus la byugs //
T02D1511:308b-17: gsang ba rab tu bstan pa las kyang /
T02D1511:308b-18: bla ma rnam pa gnyis rab bshad //
T02D1511:308b-20: rgyu yi tshul gyis mdor ston cing //
T02D1511:308b-22: mdor bstan lus ngag ngo bo ste ;
T02D1511:308b-23: / rgyas par 'chad pa sems nyid do //
T02D1511:308b-24: dkyil 'khor slob dpon tshul gyis ni //
T02D1511:308b-25: phyi rol dang ni nang du gnas //
T02D1511:308b-26: 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D1511:308b-27: bla ma bla med rnams pa gnyis //
T02D1511:308b-28: longs spyod grol ba'i 'bras ster ba //
T02D1511:308b-29: rab tu 'bad de mchod par bya //
T02D1511:308b-30: zhes gsungs pa ni slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1511:308b-33: zangs la sogs pa las byas pa'i zhabs bsil dang bsang gtor dang /
T02D1511:308b-35: mchod yon gyi snod rnams su nas dang 'o ma dang /
T02D1511:309a-1: la sogs pa blugs te yi ge gsum dang rang
T02D1511:309a-2: gi bdag po dang las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis
T02D1511:309a-3: brgya tsa brgyad dang lan bdun du bsngags la /
T02D1511:309a-4: snod de gsum rang gi g-yon du man ji'i steng du ba zhag cing /
T02D1511:309a-5: de'i mdun du yang bzed zhal gsum man ji'i steng du'o//
T02D1511:309a-6: de la zhabs bsil gyi snod kyi chu g-yas pa'i
T02D1511:309a-7: khu tshur gyis mthe bo dang mdzub mo'i skam pas
T02D1511:309a-8: me tog bzung la rol pas sor mo rnams bskor
T02D1511:309a-9: zhing mdzub mo la sogs pa'i sor mo rnams rim
T02D1511:309a-10: gyis brkyang ste / aom a'a: hr'i pra ba ra
T02D1511:309a-11: sa ta k'a ram p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha h'um
T02D1511:309a-12: gyis brkyang ste / sv'a h'a / zhes pa gsum gyis bzed zhal dbul lo //
T02D1511:309a-13: mchod pa bya ba'i zhabs gnyis la bsams nas so //
T02D1511:309a-14: snod gnyis pa'i chu g-yas na gnas pa'i ku sha'i
T02D1511:309a-15: chun po'i rtse mos blangs nas bzed zhal gzhan du
T02D1511:309a-16: mchod bya'i sku la bsang gtor bya'o //
T02D1511:309a-17: de nyid kyi chu g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mthe
T02D1511:309a-18: bong dang mdzub mo'i skam pas me tog bzung la
T02D1511:309a-19: de'i bzed zhal du kha thur du bstan pa'i khu
T02D1511:309a-20: tshul gyis zhabs bsil pa'i ched du mchod bya'i phyag
T02D1511:309a-21: tu mthe chung la sogs pa rim gyis brkyang zhing
T02D1511:309a-23: snod gsum pa'i chu la sogs pa snyim pas bzung
T02D1511:309a-24: ste rdo rje thal mo phye pas bzed zhal gyi
T02D1511:309a-25: snod gsum par mchod yon lan gsum mo //
T02D1511:309a-26: de thams cad sngags de nyid kyis te 'on kyang p'a dyam gi gnas su proksha nam dang /
T02D1511:309a-34: dri ni mchad bya'i thugs kar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1511:309a-35: 'di ni cho ga thams cad du mchod yon la sogs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1511:309a-36: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam shes pas //
T02D1511:309a-37: sngon du bsnyen pa tshogs sogs cing //
T02D1511:309a-38: bgegs ni rnam par nyams byed bya //
T02D1511:309a-39: dngos grub bsnyen pa med na min //
T02D1511:309a-40: de phyir rim gnyis de nyid rig /
T02D1511:309a-41: dben bar yang dag gnas nas ni //
T02D1511:309a-42: bde mchog 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
T02D1511:309a-43: skyo na de yi gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D1511:309a-45: yang na rang gi lha yi 'bum //
T02D1511:309a-46: dkyil 'khor pa yi khri yin te /
T02D1511:309a-47: 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par brjod //
T02D1511:309b-0: rim pa gnyis @309b kyi rnal 'byor ni //
T02D1511:309b-1: l'u yi pa'i mngon par rtogs pa la sogs bar shes par bya'o //
T02D1511:309b-3: dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba ni rgyal dang /
T02D1511:309b-6: bya dbo'i zla ba ma gtogs pa'i zla ba rnams dang /
T02D1511:309b-17: ba ba sangs rgyas rnams su'o //
T02D1511:309b-20: lag la skal ba bzang po'o //
T02D1511:309b-23: me bzhi la dngos grub po //
T02D1511:309b-26: snubs dang gro bzhin la lung la mkhas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1511:309b-27: chu stod chu slad la bu 'phel lo //
T02D1511:309b-28: khrums stod khrums smad dag la bu mo 'phel lo //
T02D1511:309b-29: zhi ba'i gza' la brten pa'i dus sbyor dang rnams par sel ba dang //
T02D1511:309b-37: sha kho na 'dzin pa ma gtogs pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T02D1511:309b-38: 'jug phod dang bral ba'i byed pa rnams la ste /
T02D1511:309b-41: dbyar dus rab gnas grub pa'o //
T02D1511:309b-42: ston ni bde ba ster bar 'gyur //
T02D1511:309b-43: dgun stod ye shes 'phel ba ster //
T02D1511:309b-44: dgun smad dbang phyug thams cad 'byung //
T02D1511:309b-45: dpyid ka dpal ni rab tu sbyin //
T02D1511:309b-46: so sa kar rgyal dang zhi ba ster //
T02D1511:309b-47: rab gnas dus ni thams cad du //
T02D1511:309b-48: sangs rgyas bzhugs su 'jug par bzhed //
T02D1511:309b-50: mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur las kyang /
T02D1511:309b-51: gtsug tor rtag tu sbyin par bya //
T02D1511:309b-52: rtag tu sbyin sreg byed du gzhug / rtag tu dkyil 'khor bri bar bya //
T02D1511:309b-53: rtag tu sangs rgyas rab gnas bya //
T02D1511:309b-54: zin pa'i de ma thag pa ru //
T02D1511:309b-55: rab tu gnas pa mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D1511:309b-56: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yi //
T02D1511:309b-57: dbang phyug thob par the tshom med //
T02D1511:309b-58: de la gza' dang rgyu skar med //
T02D1511:309b-59: bgegs dang log par 'dren pa'ang med //
T02D1511:309b-60: cung zad yid la gang 'dod pa //
T02D1511:309b-62: zhes pa ni dus kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1511:310a-0: de nas slob dpon khrus byas te lha @310a * //
T02D1511:310a-1: mchod pa dang gtor ma byas la gos gtsang ma
T02D1511:310a-2: rgyan legs par bgos pa'i bdag nyid kyis phyi dro'i
T02D1511:310a-3: dus su sa dang lci bas dkyil 'khor nye bar
T02D1511:310a-4: byugs la / pus mo g-yas pa sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar la /
T02D1511:310a-5: phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub
T02D1511:310a-6: sems dpa' dang 'jig rten skyong ba rnams las sa
T02D1511:310a-8: khams 'di na ni mgon gang dag / chen pos mchod pa bzhugs rnams dang //
T02D1511:310a-9: lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang //
T02D1511:310a-10: dri za dang lha min sogs //
T02D1511:310a-11: sems can kun don bsgrub bya'i phyir //
T02D1511:310a-12: de dang de la gsol bar bgyi //
T02D1511:310a-13: gal te khyed kyis gnang ba na //
T02D1511:310a-14: bgyi ste gzhan du ma yin no //
T02D1511:310a-15: rmi lam la sogs mtshan ma yis //
T02D1511:310a-16: sa bzang 'di ni bdag la gsol //
T02D1511:310a-17: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D1511:310a-18: de'i rjes su 'jig rten dbang byug gi mdun du mchod pa byas la //
T02D1511:310a-19: aom mu tsi li sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:310a-20: aom mo ha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:310a-21: aom da ta li sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:310a-22: zhes bya ba'i rmi lam brtag pa 'dis lag pa
T02D1511:310a-23: g-yon pa sa kha la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig
T02D1511:310a-24: bsngags la mgo lhor bstan zhing shar du kha bltas
T02D1511:310a-26: rmi lam ngan na las thams cad pa bzlas pa dang /
T02D1511:310a-27: stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis bgegs bzlog
T02D1511:310a-28: nas lhas gnang ba'am ma bkag pa'i sa la cho
T02D1511:310a-29: ga bya ste / 'on kyang srid na grong rdal dang /
T02D1511:310a-32: gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i dbang ldan kho nar dang /
T02D1511:310a-33: med na gang du yi rang bar ro //
T02D1511:310a-34: lha khang mchod rten khang bzangs khang brtsegs dang//
T02D1511:310a-35: rab gnas dkyil 'khor la sogs byed 'dod pas //
T02D1511:310a-36: 'dir ni sa yi lto 'phye brtag bya ste //
T02D1511:310a-37: sa gzhi gang yin de ni gru bzhir bya //
T02D1511:310a-38: zla ba gsum gyi nyin mo'i grangs kyis 'dir //
T02D1511:310a-39: phyogs ni so sor sa de rnam par dbye //
T02D1511:310a-40: dbang ldan nas ni me yi mtshams kyi bar //
T02D1511:310a-41: shar gyi sa de dgu bcur rnam par dbye //
T02D1511:310a-42: me nas bden bral mtshams kyi bar dang ni //
T02D1511:310a-43: bden bral nas ni rlung gi mtshams bar dang //
T02D1511:310a-44: rlung nas 'byung po'i bdag po'i mtshams kyi bar //
T02D1511:310a-45: de bzhin kho nar dgu bcur rnam dbye bya //
T02D1511:310a-46: ston zlar ba 'bring dang tha ma'i bar //
T02D1511:310b-0: dbang ldan @310b mtshams la sogs par mgo bo gnas //
T02D1511:310b-1: bden bral mtshams la sogs par mjug ma'i cha //
T02D1511:310b-2: gsang ba'i gnas ni sa yi dbus su gzhag / lte ba'i 'og gi cha ni lto 'phye'i lus //
T02D1511:310b-3: steng cha gdengs ka dang ldan mi yi gzugs //
T02D1511:310b-4: lhor blta lag pa g-yon pa rna bar gzhag / g-yas pa rin chen thogs pas dkur bkab nas //
T02D1511:310b-5: sa yi cha dgu khyab par nyal nas gnas //
T02D1511:310b-6: klu yi rgyal po lus tshad mtho bcu'o //
T02D1511:310b-7: shar dang nub kyi mtha' mar gnas na yang //
T02D1511:310b-8: sa yi dum bu de ni 'jal ba ltar //
T02D1511:310b-9: nyi ma'i bgrod pas tshes gcig la sogs par //
T02D1511:310b-10: nyin zhag re re zhing ni cha re rer ;
T02D1511:310b-11: / ji ltar rigs pas shar gyi cha ru rgyu //
T02D1511:310b-12: lho dang nub dang byang du'ang de bzhin no //
T02D1511:310b-13: dgun zla ra ba 'bring dang tha ma yi //
T02D1511:310b-14: dkar phyogs la sogs nub tu kha mig blta //
T02D1511:310b-15: me yi mtshams su yan lag mchog bstan te //
T02D1511:310b-16: rlung gi mtshams la sogs par mjug ma gnas //
T02D1511:310b-17: dpyid zlar ba 'bring dang tha ma de'i //
T02D1511:310b-18: gnod sbyin bdag phyogs kha dang mig gis blta //
T02D1511:310b-19: bden bral mtshams la sogs par mgo bo gnas //
T02D1511:310b-20: dbang ldan mtshams la sogs par mug ma'i cha //
T02D1511:310b-21: dbyar zla ra 'bring dang tha ma ru //
T02D1511:310b-22: shar phyogs su ni kha dang mig gis blta //
T02D1511:310b-23: rlung gi mtshams la sogs bar mgo bo gnas //
T02D1511:310b-24: me yi mtshams la sogs par mjug ma'i cha //
T02D1511:310b-25: lo gcig na ni sa gzhi mtha' dag tu //
T02D1511:310b-26: 'khor gcig gis ni 'bad pas kun du khyab //
T02D1511:310b-27: lto 'phyi'i rgyal po'i rgyu ba'i dbye ba ni //
T02D1511:310b-28: zla ba re re'i bye brag shes nas su //
T02D1511:310b-29: mtha' yas bdag nyid dkar po mdzes pa'i sku //
T02D1511:310b-30: mjug ma la sogs rim gyis bsams nas su //
T02D1511:310b-31: de yi lus la klu yi bdag po brgyad //
T02D1511:310b-32: 'o ma la sogs nye bar spyod mas mchod //
T02D1511:310b-33: mjug ma'i rtse mor rigs ldan shin tu sngo //
T02D1511:310b-34: gsang gnas d'ur ba ltar ljang stobs kyi rgyu //
T02D1511:310b-35: lte bar dung skyong padma'i rtsa ba bzhin //
T02D1511:310b-36: dpung bar padma chen po gser dang mtshungs //
T02D1511:310b-37: nor rgyas snying gar gnas pa ljang gu ste //
T02D1511:310b-38: 'jog po zhes bya dmar po mgrin par gnas //
T02D1511:310b-39: rna bar padma dkar po 'od zer can //
T02D1511:310b-40: spyi bo ru ni mtha' yas sngon po gnas //
T02D1511:311a-1: bgegs mthar byed kyi rnam bar bsgom //
T02D1511:311a-2: dba' bo'i lag pa tog rtse rdo rjes mtshan //
T02D1511:311a-3: lag pa g-yon pa 'og tu byas nas bzung //
T02D1511:311a-4: de yis bdud kyi tshogs ni skrag cing bzlog / shar dang byang gi phyogs su kha bltas pas //
T02D1511:311a-5: tog tse kham bzhi brgya ba pas blangs pa'i sa //
T02D1511:311a-6: zhi ba'i sems kyis gtor ma'i nang du ni //
T02D1511:311a-7: gzhag pa'am me mtshams la sogs phyir rol dor //
T02D1511:311a-8: 'bad pas de yi kham lnga pa yis //
T02D1511:311a-9: sa gzhi'i dbus su legs pa'i yid kyis dgra ma //
T02D1511:311a-10: kham lnga pa der las min du ma yin //
T02D1511:311a-11: phyogs dang mtshams su kun nas brko bar bya //
T02D1511:311a-12: shar nas cha ni nyi shu rtsa gcig dor //
T02D1511:311a-13: byang nas phyed dang bcu bzhi'i cha dor bas //
T02D1511:311a-14: shar nub cha dgu lho byang phyed dang lnga //
T02D1511:311a-15: 'di ni mchan gyi mdun du thog mar brko //
T02D1511:311a-16: de yis chos nor 'dod don 'phel zhing 'grub //
T02D1511:311a-17: gal te lho 'phye'i rgyal po gnas pa yi //
T02D1511:311a-18: cha dgu'i sa yi cha la brkos na ni //
T02D1511:311a-19: pham bu dang bu mo spun chung ma //
T02D1511:311a-20: mna' ma rang gi skye bo mdza' bshes 'chi //
T02D1511:311a-21: gal te rgyab tu brkos na rang 'chi zhing //
T02D1511:311a-22: yang na rang gnas nas 'pho nor brlag 'gyur //
T02D1511:311a-23: mjug mar glang chen rta dang me ha ra //
T02D1511:311a-24: ba lang 'chi zhing [?] stobs kyang nyams par 'gyur //
T02D1511:311a-25: gal te kham lnga'i nang du shing dang sgra //
T02D1511:311a-26: grog mkhar skra sen thal bas gnod pa 'byung //
T02D1511:311a-27: rdo bas rlung gis 'jig pa phub ma dang //
T02D1511:311a-28: mgal dum gyis rims rus pas zug zer ro //
T02D1511:311a-29: de'i don du thig chen 'debs pa na mtshan ma shes par bya ste /
T02D1511:311a-30: thig skud chad na slob dpon 'chi'o //
T02D1511:311a-33: bya rgod dang bya k'a ka skra sgrogs na yon bdag go //
T02D1511:311a-34: byi las thig skud la 'gom na de'i 'am bod bu'i rus pa yod do //
T02D1511:311a-35: bod bus 'gom na de nyid kyi'o //
T02D1511:311a-37: ra lug gis ni de dag gi'o //
T02D1511:311a-38: rta yis ni de'i rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311a-39: glang po ches ni de'i'am rnga mo'i'o //
T02D1511:311a-40: ma he'am sha bas ni ce sbyang gi'o //
T02D1511:311a-41: dom gyis ni de'i rus ba'o //
T02D1511:311a-43: stag gis ni glang po che'i'o //
T02D1511:311a-46: rus sbal gyis ni de'i rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-2: de'i las mi'i nang nas gang rung mgo bo la
T02D1511:311b-3: 'phrug na mi gang gi 'og nas sel yod do
T02D1511:311b-4: // smin ma la reg na gser ram dol gong khru gsum gyi 'og na'o //
T02D1511:311b-5: mig la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na mu tig go //
T02D1511:311b-6: kha la reg na skra'am dol gong sum mdo'i 'og tsam na'o//
T02D1511:311b-7: so la reg na khru gsum gyi 'og na so'o //
T02D1511:311b-8: rna ba la 'phrug na de man chad kyi 'og na gser ram dngul lam byi ru'o //
T02D1511:311b-9: rke la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na mgul
T02D1511:311b-10: rgyan nam lcags sprog gam dol gong ngam sol ba
T02D1511:311b-12: phrag pa la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na de'i rgyan no //
T02D1511:311b-13: mchan khung la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na lcags so //
T02D1511:311b-14: lag pa g-yas pa la reg na dku'i 'og na rgyab kyi thod pa'am sa las byas pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-15: lag pa g-yon pa la reg na bus mo'i 'og na shing khri'i rkang pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-16: brang la reg na dku tsam gyi 'og na phyugs kyi rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-17: rgyab la reg na de tsam gyi 'og na de'i rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-18: dku la reg na khru gnyis kyi 'og na lcags kyi phur bu'o //
T02D1511:311b-19: rtags la reg na khru gang gi 'og na lcags gsum gyis sel lo //
T02D1511:311b-20: byin pa la reg na mtho gang gi 'og na byin pa'i rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-21: long bu la reg na sor mo bco brgyad kyi 'og na rta'i rmig pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-22: rkang pa la reg na mtho gang tsam gyi 'og na shing s'a la ma la'i tsher ma'o //
T02D1511:311b-23: rkang pa'i mthe chung la reg na sor brgyad na 'khar ba'o //
T02D1511:311b-24: gang yang rung bas gang gi ming smos pa de'i der rus pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-25: gang du bas lci ba 'dor ba der gser ro //
T02D1511:311b-26: gzhon nu bshang ba btod na dngul lo //
T02D1511:311b-27: sbal pa sgra sgrogs na chu'i 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1511:311b-32: glang sgra sgrogs na dge ba'o //
T02D1511:311b-34: dung dang bkra shis kyi glu dang /
T02D1511:311b-35: byis pa sgra sgrogs na nor 'thob bo //
T02D1511:311b-42: nya zung la sogs pa mthong na legs pa'o zhes pa sa brko ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1511:311b-43: de nas rdo ba la sogs pa bsal nas sa
T02D1511:311b-44: de nyid kyis sam des mi ldang na gzhan gyis
T02D1511:311b-45: la yang di bzangs kyi chus btab ste dong dgang
T02D1511:312a-2: byang shar 'bab pas dngos grub ni //
T02D1511:312a-3: sngags pa rnams la rtag tu 'byung //
T02D1511:312a-4: dkyil mtho bas ni rgyal srid 'byung //
T02D1511:312a-7: yang na nor ni brlag par 'gyur //
T02D1511:312a-8: ji ltar bshad pa'i dma' ba ni //
T02D1511:312a-9: mtho na myur du rigs zad 'gyur //
T02D1511:312a-10: gal te sa yi dbus dma' na //
T02D1511:312a-11: sgrub pa po la gnod pa 'byung //
T02D1511:312a-13: khru gang nas ni brtsams nas su //
T02D1511:312a-14: ji srid khru ni stong gi bar //
T02D1511:312a-15: zhes gsungs pas bum pa'i phreng bas bskor ba'i ched
T02D1511:312a-16: du ji srid 'dod pa'i tshad kyis gru bzhir byas
T02D1511:312a-17: la de'i steng du mandala zlum po dpangs la khru
T02D1511:312a-18: phyed pa dbus cung zad mtho ba g-yas skor du
T02D1511:312a-19: 'bab dkar ba dbang ldan gyi phyogs dma' bar byas
T02D1511:312a-21: dum skyes ma bzlas pa'i dri'i chus btab la btung bar bya'o //
T02D1511:312a-22: dkyil 'khor khang pa'i rtsa ba'i sgo yang dbang ldan kho nar bya'o //
T02D1511:312a-23: khang bzang rdo steng ba lang ltas //
T02D1511:312a-24: drang srong gnas sogs chu bo'i 'gram //
T02D1511:312a-25: sngon du 'dus byas gnas dag tu'ang //
T02D1511:312a-26: ma brkos na yang dag pa yin //
T02D1511:312a-27: sa sel nyes pa thams cad ni //
T02D1511:312a-28: gal te dbyung bar ma nus na //
T02D1511:312a-29: lag pas reg nas sngags bzlas te //
T02D1511:312a-30: de nyid dag pa chen po yin //
T02D1511:312a-31: zhes pa dum skyes ma'i sngags kyis bgegs bskrad nas
T02D1511:312a-32: des bsngags pa'i yungs kar dang chu dang thal bas
T02D1511:312a-33: gtor ro // ba'i rnam pa lngas byugs la dri bzangs kyi chus gtor te /
T02D1511:312a-34: aom bhu kham zhes pa 'dis nam mkhar bya'o //
T02D1511:312a-35: h'um lam h'um zhes pa 'dis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du bya'o //
T02D1511:312a-36: las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i rin po che dang sman dang /
T02D1511:312a-37: 'bru lnga dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang du bcug la dri bzangs kyi chus byugs te /
T02D1511:312a-38: nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sa'i lha mo nang du
T02D1511:312a-39: bstims la 'gro ba stong pa nyid dang ro gcig
T02D1511:312a-40: par lhag par mos nas yi ge gsum gyi byin
T02D1511:312a-41: gyis brlab cing dril bu dkrol zhing yi ge brgya
T02D1511:312a-42: pa gdon no // de gsungs pa /
T02D1511:312a-43: de la chu dang lci ba yis //
T02D1511:312a-44: dkyil 'khor sa ni nye bar byugs //
T02D1511:312a-45: dur khrod thal ba dang ldan pa //
T02D1511:312a-46: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa yis //
T02D1511:312b-0: de nas sa ni nyer byugs @312b nas //
T02D1511:312b-1: de la dkyil 'khor yang dag bri //
T02D1511:312b-2: zhes pa 'di ni sa sbyong ba'o //
T02D1511:312b-3: bde mchog mnyes par nus pa dang //
T02D1511:312b-4: sdom pa las gsungs bya bar ldan //
T02D1511:312b-5: phag mo la gus mnyes gshis pa //
T02D1511:312b-6: gtsang zhing brtson ldan bsod nams 'dod //
T02D1511:312b-7: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i pha rol son //
T02D1511:312b-8: chog shes slob mar 'os pa rnams //
T02D1511:312b-9: btus te sgo yi slob dpon bya //
T02D1511:312b-10: zhes gsungs pas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste rdo rje dang dril bu bzung ste /
T02D1511:312b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
T02D1511:312b-12: srung pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pas bgegs bskrad nas
T02D1511:312b-13: spos phor thogs te h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1511:312b-14: ljags kyis / ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
T02D1511:312b-15: sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol //
T02D1511:312b-16: bdag ni che ge rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D1511:312b-19: dngos grub 'dir ni yang dag stsol //
T02D1511:312b-20: zhes pas sangs rgyas la sogs pa la snyan gsan
T02D1511:312b-21: phab nas nam mkha' la gnas pa'i ma mkha' 'gro
T02D1511:312b-22: ma la sogs pa'i phyogs su gnas pa rdo rje
T02D1511:312b-23: dang dril bu thogs pa mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
T02D1511:312b-24: pa'i rnal 'byor can slob ma bzhi yis sam gcig
T02D1511:312b-25: gis kyang de dang der rim gyis song ste bla
T02D1511:312b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02D1511:312b-28: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02D1511:312b-29: chos kun mchog ni bdag med pa //
T02D1511:312b-30: dkyil 'khor mchog ni bstan du gsol //
T02D1511:312b-31: mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02D1511:312b-32: mtshan min thams cad rnam par sbangs ;
T02D1511:312b-33: / kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02D1511:312b-34: zhi ba'i spyod mchog las byung ba //
T02D1511:312b-35: ye shes spyod pa rnam spyod mdzad //
T02D1511:312b-36: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor mchog ni bshad du gsol //
T02D1511:312b-37: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02D1511:312b-38: dag pa rang bzhin dri ma med //
T02D1511:312b-39: kun du bzang po thugs kyi mchog / dkyil 'khor kha los sgyur bshad gsol //
T02D1511:312b-40: gsol 'debs pa med na bsam gtan gyis kyang bya'o //
T02D1511:313a-0: de nas spro ba la sogs pa byas nas bsgoms pa'i dkyil 'khor @313a * //
T02D1511:313a-1: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis mdzub mo gnyis brkyang
T02D1511:313a-2: la rtse mo sbyar ba kha 'og tu bstan nas
T02D1511:313a-3: spyi bor bzung zhing h'um badzrota tishthi zhes pas nam
T02D1511:313a-4: mkha' la bteg la skyil krung bshigs nas langs te
T02D1511:313a-5: kha lhor phyogs bas rkang pa mnyam par gnas pas
T02D1511:313a-6: spyi bor thal mo sbyar bas de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1511:313a-7: rnams la phyag byas nas sems can ma rig pas
T02D1511:313a-8: long zhing bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams mthong
T02D1511:313a-9: nas bdud bskrad par bya ste /
T02D1511:313a-11: dpal he ru ka dpal rnam 'byor che //
T02D1511:313a-12: bsgoms nas bdud ni brlag par bya //
T02D1511:313a-13: rab tu gdug pa'i tshogs ni bskrad //
T02D1511:313a-14: bgegs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhan yang ngo //
T02D1511:313a-15: 'bar ba'i h'um las byung ba yi //
T02D1511:313a-16: rdo rje rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod //
T02D1511:313a-17: mig g-yas g-yon du ma da las //
T02D1511:313a-18: skyes pa'i nyi ma zla ba bsam //
T02D1511:313a-19: g-yon pas rdo rje dril bu blang //
T02D1511:313a-20: g-yas ba rdo rje yang dag ldan //
T02D1511:313a-21: sems can don brtson khros pa yis //
T02D1511:313a-22: blo dang ldan pas phyogs kun blta //
T02D1511:313a-23: de ru gnas pa'i gdug pa gang //
T02D1511:313a-24: bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams /
T02D1511:313a-25: de rnams bskrad par bya ched du //
T02D1511:313a-26: tshig ni 'di dag nye bar brjod //
T02D1511:313a-27: gnas kyi bdag po gang rung rnams //
T02D1511:313a-28: klu dang gnod sbyin dri za sogs //
T02D1511:313a-30: sems can don du bya rtsom pas //
T02D1511:313a-31: shin tu myur bar song cig kye //
T02D1511:313a-32: khyed rnams kun nas phyir dengs shig / dpal he ru ka'i bka' thos nas //
T02D1511:313a-33: myur ba nyid du phyir khyer cig / gang zhig 'gro bar mi byed pa //
T02D1511:313a-34: de'i mgo bo bdag gi 'bar ba'i rdo rje yis /
T02D1511:313a-35: kha tv'am ga 'dis tshal pa brgyar dags par bya'o //
T02D1511:313a-36: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1511:313a-37: aom grihna grihna h'um h'um phat /
T02D1511:313a-38: aom grihn'a pa ya h'um h'um phat /
T02D1511:313a-39: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga w'an badzra h'um h'um phat /
T02D1511:313a-40: me yi mtshams nas brtsams nas su //
T02D1511:313a-41: g-yon du bskor bas brtson pa yis //
T02D1511:313a-42: dpa' bo chen po khro bos bskor //
T02D1511:313a-43: bskal pa'i me ni langs ba ltar //
T02D1511:313a-44: zhes gsungs pas bdag khor bya zhing rdo rje bsor
T02D1511:313a-45: ba dang dril bu dkrol bas rdo rje'i 'gros kyis
T02D1511:313a-46: me mtshams su song la de nas brtsams te /
T02D1511:313b-0: g-yon skor du slob ma dang bcas pas dkyil 'khor @313b du rdo rje'i 'gros kyis gar bya'o //
T02D1511:313b-1: sgo re re rab bdag gi g-yon du gnas pa'i
T02D1511:313b-2: slob ma'i dril bu'i nang du rdo rje gzhug cing
T02D1511:313b-3: de'i rdo rje yang rang gi dril bu'i nang du'o
T02D1511:313b-4: // de ltar mdun dang rgyab du'o //
T02D1511:313b-5: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya //
T02D1511:313b-7: de dag rab tu sbyar ba yis //
T02D1511:313b-8: dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'byung //
T02D1511:313b-9: aom a'a: kha badzra dhri ka badzra h'um ka re
T02D1511:313b-10: na h'um zhes brjod cing mig gis dbang gis sta
T02D1511:313b-11: stangs bzhin shar phyogs su dus mnyam por g-yas brkyang
T02D1511:313b-13: slob mas brkyang gis gnas pas brjod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1511:313b-14: mya ngan khro ba snying stobs dang //
T02D1511:313b-15: de bzhin drag po'i bya ba gnyis //
T02D1511:313b-16: rang bzhin gyi ni ro 'di dag / dang po'i zhal la gnas pa'o //
T02D1511:313b-17: mi sdug pa dang ngo mtshar gnyis //
T02D1511:313b-18: 'jigs pa dang ni spro ba dag / rang bzhin gyis gnas ro 'dir bcas //
T02D1511:313b-19: g-yon pa'i zhal nas gnas pa'i gsung //
T02D1511:313b-20: dgod pa dang ni dga' ba dang //
T02D1511:313b-21: le lo snyom dang sgeg pa dang //
T02D1511:313b-22: rang bzhin gyis gnas po 'di dag / nub kyi zhal la yang dag gnas //
T02D1511:313b-23: smon pa dang ni rmad du byung gnyis //
T02D1511:313b-24: de bzhin dpa' bo'i dar dbyangs dang //
T02D1511:313b-25: dpa' ba dang ni 'jigs su rung //
T02D1511:313b-26: lho yi zhal la gnas pa'o //
T02D1511:313b-27: padma rdo rje'i bar du ni //
T02D1511:313b-28: gang zhig sems ni yang dag gnas //
T02D1511:313b-29: zhi ba de nyi yang dag dag / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i gar //
T02D1511:313b-30: de nyid shes la gar dang 'dir //
T02D1511:313b-31: gar gyi yod chos the tshom med //
T02D1511:313b-32: 'jig rten pa rnams dga' ba'i phyir //
T02D1511:313b-33: 'jig rten chos zhen gar gyed do //
T02D1511:313b-34: mgul rgyan la sogs pa'i stang bstan par bya ste /
T02D1511:313b-35: mgul rgyan stangs ni g-yon du ste //
T02D1511:313b-36: g-yas su de bzhin gdu bu'i stangs //
T02D1511:313b-37: rna rgyan bar rnams par dgod //
T02D1511:313b-38: gtsug gi nor bu de phyogs su //
T02D1511:313b-39: thal pa'i stangs ni g-yas su'o //
T02D1511:313b-41: gang ni zur mig zung blta zhing //
T02D1511:313b-42: he ru ka zhal 'o byed pa //
T02D1511:313b-43: phag mo yang ni gar byed de //
T02D1511:313b-44: kunda zla ba'i mdog ltar tshems //
T02D1511:313b-45: dkar mo h'um sgrogs khro mo ni //
T02D1511:313b-46: bgegs ni thams cad nyams byed ma //
T02D1511:313b-47: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' bas rol //
T02D1511:313b-48: sems can don la brtson par byed //
T02D1511:313b-49: de dang ldan cig dpa' bo che //
T02D1511:314a-2: byed pa'i stangs la sogs pa'i spyod gur byas nas //
T02D1511:314a-3: de ltar go cha'i go bgos te //
T02D1511:314a-4: lha rnams spyod gur byas nas //
T02D1511:314a-5: de ltar go cha'i go bgos te //
T02D1511:314a-6: lha rnams kyis kyang 'byed mi nus //
T02D1511:314a-7: h'um byung khro mo du ma yis //
T02D1511:314a-8: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bkab nas su //
T02D1511:314a-9: rdo rje'i lta bas bya zhing //
T02D1511:314a-10: sngags pas yi ge bdun pa brjod //
T02D1511:314a-11: 'di ni sa yongs su gzung pa'o //
T02D1511:314a-12: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug la dri'i mandala byugs
T02D1511:314a-13: te bam las skyes pa'i sa'i lha mo rnam bar
T02D1511:314a-14: bsgoms shing lag pa g-yas su zla ba la h'um
T02D1511:314a-15: gsum bsams nas sor mo'i rtse mos la lan gsum
T02D1511:314a-16: bsnun ba dang / de'i sgra dang h'um yig gi
T02D1511:314a-17: 'og zer gyis bskul bas bzhengs pa'i ye shes sems
T02D1511:314a-18: dpa'i tshul dang gcig tu gyur pa ser mo zhi
T02D1511:314a-19: ba na bza' dkar po can rgyan dang bcas pa
T02D1511:314a-20: dgyes pa g-yon na gser gyi bum pa bzang po
T02D1511:314a-21: bsnun ba dang / dang / g-yas pas mi 'jigs
T02D1511:314a-22: pa sbyin pa la mdun du mchod yon la sogs
T02D1511:314a-23: pas mchod de lhag par mos pas /
T02D1511:314a-24: skyob ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1511:314a-25: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par dang //
T02D1511:314a-26: sa dang pha rol phyin rnams la //
T02D1511:314a-27: lha mo khyod ni dbang du gyur //
T02D1511:314a-28: skyob pa sh'akya seng ge yis //
T02D1511:314a-29: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02D1511:314a-30: de ltar bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02D1511:314a-31: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02D1511:314a-32: zhes pa lan gsum brjod nas lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1511:314a-34: mgon po bdag gis ci zhig bya //
T02D1511:314a-35: rdo rje 'dzin bka' bdag la gsol //
T02D1511:314a-36: khyed kyi bkra shis don du ni ;
T02D1511:314a-38: lan gsum brjod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1511:314a-39: mnyes nas mdzes ma 'di skad brjod //
T02D1511:314a-40: mgon po khyed kyi shes mod kyi //
T02D1511:314a-41: bsod nams phung po dri med pa //
T02D1511:314a-42: nga ni khyed nyid la gzhol zhing //
T02D1511:314a-43: kun nas khyed kyi dpang du gnas //
T02D1511:314a-44: khyed kyis bka' ni gang stsal //
T02D1511:314a-45: de ni bdag gis byed par brtson //
T02D1511:314a-46: zhes brjod nas de nyid la thim par bsam mo //
T02D1511:314a-47: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa nang bcings nas //
T02D1511:314a-48: de yis sa ni mnan nas su //
T02D1511:314a-49: aom badzr'i bha ba h'um zhes pas lan gsum mngon
T02D1511:314b-0: par bsngags te rdo rje bcings pa las 'thon @314b
T02D1511:314b-1: pa'i 'bar ba'i h'um gi tshogs kyis sa 'og gi
T02D1511:314b-2: bar rdo rjer gyur par bsams la /
T02D1511:314b-3: aom badzr'i dri dha tishtha zhes pa lan gsum brjod pas byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D1511:314b-4: de nas sa gzhi rang dbang du 'gyur ro zhes pa nor 'dzin ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1511:314b-5: de nas phyi dro slob dpon khrus dang dri bzangs
T02D1511:314b-6: dang gos dmar po dang rgyan thams cad dang ldan
T02D1511:314b-7: pas / aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat /
T02D1511:314b-9: lan bdun bsngags pa'i gos dmar po'i dbu rgyan can
T02D1511:314b-10: dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du kha lto ru bstan nas
T02D1511:314b-11: 'dug ste / dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i bya ba
T02D1511:314b-12: la dgos pa'i phyir dang po rdul tshon dkar pos
T02D1511:314b-13: padma 'dab brgyad bris pa'i lte ba ru rnam par
T02D1511:314b-15: las thams cad pa'i bum pa bzhag la shar gyi
T02D1511:314b-16: 'dab ma la 'chad 'gyur ba'i chogs lhag gnas byas
T02D1511:314b-17: pa'i tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'i snod du gnas bya
T02D1511:314b-20: nub dang mtshams bzhi'i 'dab ma rnams la ji ltar rigs par sa tshon lnga'i snod rnams so //
T02D1511:314b-21: he ru ka dpal rgyal po che'i //
T02D1511:314b-22: rnal 'byor dbang phyugs nges byas pa //
T02D1511:314b-23: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02D1511:314b-24: bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya //
T02D1511:314b-25: mgrin pa mthon zhing lto ba che //
T02D1511:314b-26: mchu 'phyang rtsa ba med pa dang //
T02D1511:314b-27: nag pho la sogs dang bral ba //
T02D1511:314b-28: zhes gsungs pas zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i bum pa'i nang zlum po'i ser bcug drug go //
T02D1511:314b-29: nang gi 'og nas kha'i mchu'i bar gyi dpangs la sor mo nyi shu'o //
T02D1511:314b-30: kha nas 'phyang pa'i mchu ni sor gnyis so //
T02D1511:314b-31: mgrin pa ni sor drug go //
T02D1511:314b-32: phrag pa sor gnyis dma' bar byas te /
T02D1511:314b-34: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor cho ga las //
T02D1511:314b-35: ma nu'i sor gyis de yid dpangs zhes so //
T02D1511:314b-36: kha ni mchu'i mtha' nas mchu mtha'i bar du sor brgyad do //
T02D1511:314b-37: sor brgyad kyi chag gnyis ni mgrin pa'i bu ga'o ;
T02D1511:314b-38: / cha gcig gis ni mchu gnyis kyi zhing ngo //
T02D1511:314b-39: gser ram dngul las byas pa yi //
T02D1511:314b-40: zangs sam sa las byas kyang rung //
T02D1511:314b-41: ji ltar rnyed pa bzung nas ni //
T02D1511:314b-42: brtul zhugs can gyis bum pa dgod //
T02D1511:315a-0: de stong pa nyid du bsgoms la bam las byung ba'i rin po che'i rang bzhin @315a * //
T02D1511:315a-1: tsandan nam 'bras btags pa'am sa dkar gyis dkar por byas te mtshan ma bris la /
T02D1511:315a-2: bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pa'i dri lnga'i chu dang /
T02D1511:315a-5: 'bru lnga nang du du blugs la 'dab mas kha brgyan pa phreng ba dang bcas pa /
T02D1511:315a-6: ras zung gis mgul pa dkris pa /
T02D1511:315a-7: dri bzangs kyi mandala gyi steng du rjes su mthun pa'i gdan la /
T02D1511:315a-8: aom badzra she kha ra ru ta ma ta d'i
T02D1511:315a-9: sham bandha bandha h'um zhes pa bdun bzlas pa'i srang
T02D1511:315a-10: bu dkar pos ras kyi steng du mgul pa bcings
T02D1511:315a-12: byi ru dngul dang gser dang ni //
T02D1511:315a-13: padma r'a ga mu tig go //
T02D1511:315a-14: nas gro sran chung nag mo dang //
T02D1511:315a-15: til dang mu tig bum par gzhug / bri ha ti kanda ka ri dad //
T02D1511:315a-16: sa ha de ba gzhan mi thub //
T02D1511:315a-17: dan do tpa la'i rtsa ba ste //
T02D1511:315a-18: sman ni rnam pa lnga gzhug bya //
T02D1511:315a-19: aa mra au du mw'a ra dag //
T02D1511:315a-20: mya ngan med dang byang chub shing //
T02D1511:315a-21: klu shing yal ga lnga bzung nas //
T02D1511:315a-22: bum pa rnams kyi kha rgyan bya //
T02D1511:315a-23: ras ni dkar po che ba yis //
T02D1511:315a-24: bum pa'i mgul pa dkri bar bya //
T02D1511:315a-25: chog mkhas pas srad bu ni //
T02D1511:315a-26: dkar po ras kyi steng du dgod //
T02D1511:315a-27: dkyil 'khor pa ni thams cad kyi //
T02D1511:315a-28: sa bos yang phyag mtshan ni //
T02D1511:315a-29: gur gsum la sogs 'dus byas las //
T02D1511:315a-30: mkhas pas bum pa'i logs la dgod //

T02D1511:315a-32: bdug cing dri lnga'i chu yis dgang //
T02D1511:315a-34: de la mtshan ma ni sna tshogs padma'i lte ba'i
T02D1511:315a-35: nyi mar dpal bde mchog gi rdo rje sngon po
T02D1511:315a-36: rtse lnga pa kha gyes pa'o//
T02D1511:315a-37: las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i gri gug go //
T02D1511:315a-38: rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng du /
T02D1511:315a-39: aom badzra aa mri da aud ka sha:h'um zhes pa
T02D1511:315a-40: 'di dang yi ge gsum lan bdun bzlas pas ye
T02D1511:315a-41: shes kyi bdud rtsir byas te /
T02D1511:315a-42: rdo rje rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin phyi nang gi bdud rtsi lnga dang /
T02D1511:315a-43: dri bzangs kyi chu dag ldan pa h'um gis bsngags
T02D1511:315a-44: pa'i dung dam padma'i snod dang me tog gi phreng
T02D1511:315a-45: bas bcings pa'i rdo rje bzhag nas dbus su /
T02D1511:315a-46: aom ta pte ta pte ma h'a ta pte sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:315a-47: zhes bya bas bkug pa'i lha yul gyi gangga'i chu'i
T02D1511:315a-48: ngo bo'i chu la lha'i 'khor lo gdan dang bcas
T02D1511:315a-49: pa skad cig gis bsams la /
T02D1511:315b-0: mdun du rang gi snying ga'i sa bon gyi @315b
T02D1511:315b-1: 'od zer gyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
T02D1511:315b-4: mchod yon phul bas de nas de dam tshig gi
T02D1511:315b-5: 'khor lo la bcug nas 'dod chags chan pos zhu
T02D1511:315b-6: bar gyur nas byang chub sems kyang ngo bor blugs
T02D1511:315b-7: pa'i chu dang rog gcig tu gyur par bsam mo
T02D1511:315b-8: // mtshan ma la yang dam tshig gi lha ye
T02D1511:315b-9: shes kyi lha dang gcig tu gyur par bsam mo
T02D1511:315b-10: // // de nas h'um brjod cing rdo rje dang
T02D1511:315b-11: 'brel ba'i me tog gi phreng ba'i mthar g-yon pa'i
T02D1511:315b-12: khu tshur gyis bzung nas lo'i gtso bo'i snying po
T02D1511:315b-13: dang lha mo'i snying pos brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon
T02D1511:315b-14: // // par bsngags pa / der dum skyes ma
T02D1511:315b-15: bzlas pa'i me tog dkar po gsum gzhug par bya'o
T02D1511:315b-16: // // par bsngags pa / // de ltar bum
T02D1511:315b-17: pa gzhan yang rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa
T02D1511:315b-18: na lhag par gnas par bya ste /
T02D1511:315b-19: khyad par du ni 'khor lo lnga la so sor ser re re ste lnga'o //
T02D1511:315b-20: yang na nang gi rim par gnas ba rnams kho na'i lnga'o //
T02D1511:315b-21: yang na de rnams kyi lnga dang 'khor lo bzhi'i bzhi ste dgu'o //
T02D1511:315b-22: yang na dbus kyi rim par gnas pa'am dam tshig
T02D1511:315b-23: 'khor lor gnas pa rnams kyi dang bcu gsum mo
T02D1511:315b-24: // thugs kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D1511:315b-25: mtshams su gnas pa rnams kyi gcig dang /
T02D1511:315b-26: de bzhin du gsung gi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1511:315b-27: sku'i 'khor lo yang ste bcu dgu'o //
T02D1511:315b-28: brjod pa'i phyogs dang lha so so'i dgod pa la
T02D1511:315b-29: yang las thams cad pa dum skyes ma'i lhag par
T02D1511:315b-30: dgod do // mtshan ma ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma
T02D1511:315b-31: la mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi'i gri gug
T02D1511:315b-32: gam bum pa tha dad pa'i phyogs la re re'o
T02D1511:315b-33: dgod do // // rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa rnams kyi gri gug nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1511:315b-34: dpa' ba rnams gtso bo ma yin pa'i phyir mtshan ma mi bri'o //
T02D1511:315b-35: khva gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi gri gug brgyad sna tshogs padma dang nyi ma la'o //
T02D1511:315b-36: lus la ni byang chub kyi bdud rtsis gang ba'i
T02D1511:315b-37: rtsa rnams kho na bum pa ste sems tshim par
T02D1511:315b-40: phyi yi bum pa'i mtshan ma gang //
T02D1511:315b-41: bshad pa thams cad ji ltar bar //
T02D1511:315b-42: lus kyi dkyil 'khor bum pa yi //
T02D1511:315b-43: mtshan nyid lus la yang dag 'byung //
T02D1511:316a-0: zhes dang bum pa lhag par gnas @316a * //
T02D1511:316a-2: / sngags pa lho ru kha bltas pa //

T02D1511:316a-13: yang dag par mchod cing bstod de //

T02D1511:316a-16: la h'um bkod la lag pa g-yas par spos phor
T02D1511:316a-17: thogs te g-yon pas dril bu dkrol zhing /

T02D1511:316a-19: / slob ma rnams la brtse don dang //
T02D1511:316a-20: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D1511:316a-21: mgon po snying rje'i bdag nyid kyi //
T02D1511:316a-23: de phyir bcom ldan bdag gus la //

T02D1511:316a-26: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02D1511:316a-27: gzhan yang gang dag sngags kyi lha //
T02D1511:316a-28: lha dang 'jig rten skyong ba dang //

T02D1511:316a-35: ji ltar nus pa nyer spyod pas //
T02D1511:316a-36: 'gro ba sbyang phyir bri bar bya //
T02D1511:316a-37: de phyir bdag ni slob bcas la //
T02D1511:316a-38: thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas ni //
T02D1511:316a-39: 'dus par gyur pa thams cad kyi //
T02D1511:316a-40: dkyil 'khor la ni nyer byar rigs //
T02D1511:316a-41: zhes pas ni mngon du byed cing lan gsum du
T02D1511:316a-42: brjod pas gsol ba gdab par bya'o zhes pa lha
T02D1511:316a-43: lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1511:316a-44: snga dro dpa' bo chen po ni //
T02D1511:316a-45: lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1511:316a-46: phag mo'i sbyor ba yis ni gnas //
T02D1511:316b-1: dam tshig nyams pa'i dogs pa yis //
T02D1511:316b-2: slob min gzhug par mi bya'o //
T02D1511:316b-3: zhes pas rang gis dbang ma byin na slob dpon
T02D1511:316b-4: gyi sngom pa byin la lhag par gnas par byas
T02D1511:316b-5: pa'i sgo'i slob dpon bzhi ste tha na gcig kyang
T02D1511:316b-6: rung ngo // lnga pa las kyi rdo rjer bya'o //
T02D1511:316b-7: lhag pa gnas par byas pa'i lha rnams mchod de blos nam mkha' la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1511:316b-8: dang po ru ni skya thig ste //
T02D1511:316b-9: de yi rjes la ye shes thig / phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsams nas //
T02D1511:316b-10: rnal 'byor pa yis cho gas gdab //
T02D1511:316b-11: de nas ro yi srad bu ni //
T02D1511:316b-12: khrag chen po yis byugs pa yis //
T02D1511:316b-13: dpal he ru ka'i pho brang mchog / dkyil 'khor 'jigs su rung ba gdab //
T02D1511:316b-14: rab byung me tog gis byugs la //
T02D1511:316b-15: rnal 'byor rig pas thod par gzhag / srad bu dam pa mngon par bsngags //
T02D1511:316b-16: mkha' 'gro ma yi sngags kyis bsrung //
T02D1511:316b-17: bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1511:316b-18: cho ga bzhin du kha dog lnga //
T02D1511:316b-19: srad bu de ni gcig tu dril //
T02D1511:316b-20: sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlab //
T02D1511:316b-21: dza: dza: dza: zhes mdun gnas pa'i /
T02D1511:316b-22: slob ma la ni gtang bar bya //

T02D1511:316b-24: dza: dza: dza: zhes rang mdun du ;
T02D1511:316b-25: / cung zad ye shes dang ldan pas //
T02D1511:316b-26: gzhon nu gzhon nu ma mchog la //
T02D1511:316b-27: dba' bo rnal 'byor ma phab nas //
T02D1511:316b-28: thig 'debs pa ni sbyar bar bya //
T02D1511:316b-29: bde mchog 'khor lo de gnyis kyis //
T02D1511:316b-30: legs par mdzad pa gsal bar mthong //
T02D1511:316b-31: gnas la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams //
T02D1511:316b-32: lhan cig skyes pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1511:316b-33: rdo rje'i thig ni gdab pa dang //
T02D1511:316b-34: rdul tshon yang ni gdab pa dag / sems can dman pas mi bya ste //
T02D1511:316b-35: byas na byang chub stobs med do //
T02D1511:316b-36: zhes gsungs pas kha lhor phyogs te dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1511:316b-37: gtso bo'i rnal 'byor can mtshan ma thob pas gzhon
T02D1511:316b-38: nu ma nyams pas bkal ba'am dpa' bo'i rin gyis
T02D1511:316b-39: nyos pa'i skud pa lnga pa lnga snod lngar gnas
T02D1511:316b-40: pa rnams dri zhim po'i tshon dkar po dang /
T02D1511:317a-0: nag po rnams dang yungs kar gyi phye ma rnams dang bdud rtsi lnga bsres @317a * //
T02D1511:317a-1: pa rnams kyis so sor kha bsgyur te g-yon pa'i
T02D1511:317a-2: lag mthil du sor mo'i rtse mo nas brtsams te
T02D1511:317a-3: mthe bong gi rtsa ba'i bar du bkod nas //
T02D1511:317a-4: bhr'um aam hr'i: kham h'um gi yi ge rnams las
T02D1511:317a-5: skyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i ngo bor bsgoms
T02D1511:317a-6: nas nam mkha' la bzhugs su gsol ba'i rang gi
T02D1511:317a-7: phyogs su de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i thugs kar bhr'um
T02D1511:317a-8: la sogs pa las skyes pa'i ye shes kyi skud
T02D1511:317a-9: pa 'od zer dang bcas pa bltas nas /
T02D1511:317a-10: aom a'a: d'a ki ni badzra su tram me pra
T02D1511:317a-11: yatstsha ma h'a mandala s'u tra n'a ya h'um zhes
T02D1511:317a-12: pa dang / ming bsgyur bas gzhan la ste /
T02D1511:317a-13: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i bzhin mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa la gsol ba gdab bo //
T02D1511:317a-14: mig gnyis dza: las skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po'i rang bzhin gyi /
T02D1511:317a-15: aom d'i pti dra shti aangku sha dza: zhes brjod nas /
T02D1511:317a-16: mig rab tu myur bar g-yo ba'i mig gi rdzi
T02D1511:317a-17: mas 'gugs shing 'bar ba'i lta ba lcags kyu bzhin
T02D1511:317a-18: gyis mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa btang bas bkug
T02D1511:317a-19: nas lag pa na gnas pa'i rang rang gi kha
T02D1511:317a-20: dog can gyi skud pa'i nang du gzhug par bya'o
T02D1511:317a-21: // me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa
T02D1511:317a-22: rnams la ye shes bzhi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir
T02D1511:317a-23: // / nyi shu lngar phye ba'i srad bu me'i
T02D1511:317a-24: mtshams su gnas pa'i slob dpon las thams cad pa'i
T02D1511:317a-25: gzugs skud pa bzung ba dang lhan cig dkyil du
T02D1511:317a-26: gnas pa'i slob dpon gyis dril bar bya ste de
T02D1511:317a-27: nas lnga srad bu gcig tu'o //
T02D1511:317a-28: aom a'a: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga t'a: sarba
T02D1511:317a-29: dharm'a: par sba ra aa nu pra bishti sarba dharm'a
T02D1511:317a-30: aa tyan ta aa nu pra bashti: sarba dharm'a h'um
T02D1511:317a-31: zhes brjod cing dril ba slob dpon dang slob ma'i
T02D1511:317a-32: lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mo nas brtsams te sor
T02D1511:317a-33: mo bzhi'i nang du bcug la rgyab nas bskor nas
T02D1511:317a-34: yang bcug ste bskor la de dag gis rdo rje
T02D1511:317a-35: khu tshur byas pa kho na'i mdzub mo'i rgyab kyi
T02D1511:317a-36: sa la bzhag ste dman pa'i bar dor nas /
T02D1511:317a-37: ji ltar dkyil 'khor las nyis 'gyur du ring bar
T02D1511:317a-38: gyur pa nas kyi tshad kyis sngom pa bdud rtsi
T02D1511:317a-39: lnga dang ba'i rnam pa lngas spangs pa yi ge
T02D1511:317a-40: gsum nang du chud par byas la snod gtsang mar
T02D1511:317a-41: bzhag ste mchod la lag pas bkab ste las thams
T02D1511:317a-43: mig g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ma dang ta las
T02D1511:317b-0: nyi ma @317b dang zla ba dag gis sngar bzhin
T02D1511:317b-1: du badzra dri shti ma ta zhes bas brtan par
T02D1511:317b-2: byas te las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i bdud rtsi'i
T02D1511:317b-3: chu dang yungs kar gyis bran la rdo rje dang
T02D1511:317b-4: bcas pa'i lag pa g-yas pas reg la /
T02D1511:317b-5: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bzlas nas /
T02D1511:317b-6: yi ge gsum gyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te lhag par gnas par bya'o //
T02D1511:317b-7: dkyil 'khor gyis gzhi aom sarba sam sho dha ni
T02D1511:317b-8: h'um phat ces pa'i sngags kyis bum pa thams cad
T02D1511:317b-9: kyi chus gtor te de dag par byas pa ste
T02D1511:317b-10: dris byugs la / phyi rol du me tog bkram
T02D1511:317b-11: la nam mkhar gnas pa'i ye shes 'khor lo bltas
T02D1511:317b-12: la mchod yon la sogs pas mchod cing btung la
T02D1511:317b-13: dris byugs la / / rang yang de'i rnal 'byor
T02D1511:317b-14: can dang las thams cad pa'i gzugs kyis slob ma'i
T02D1511:317b-15: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i mig dag la dza: las
T02D1511:317b-16: skyes pa'i zla ba dang nyi ma ser po bsams
T02D1511:317b-17: la rdo rje'i 'gros kyis thig skud de g-yon pa'i
T02D1511:317b-18: rdo rje khu tshur gyis bzung nas lte bar bzung
T02D1511:317b-19: dris byugs la / / ste / sgrub pa'i grogs
T02D1511:317b-20: kyis kyang de bzhin du bzung ba'i skud pa de
T02D1511:317b-22: dza: yig gsum gyis sgrub pa'i grogs po de la
T02D1511:317b-23: gtad par bsams la sngags des de bzhin du bkug
T02D1511:317b-24: par bsams la / slob dpon byang du gnas shing
T02D1511:317b-25: kha lhor bltas pa dang nub tu kha bltas te
T02D1511:317b-26: shar du gnas pas rang gi mdun du gnas pa'i
T02D1511:317b-27: slob ma dang bcas pas lte ba dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1511:317b-28: nam mkha' la gdab cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i
T02D1511:317b-29: lag pa'i mthe bong dang ming med kyis thig skud
T02D1511:317b-30: bzung ste gdab pa'i sgra bya'o //
T02D1511:317b-31: thig gdab pa thams cad du yang /
T02D1511:317b-32: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram ma ti kra
T02D1511:317b-33: ma h'um bhr'um aom hr'i: kham h'um zhes brjod do
T02D1511:317b-34: // de thams cad thig skud de'i sgras nam mkha'
T02D1511:317b-35: khyab pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bskul te de dag kyang
T02D1511:317b-36: byon te thig skud kyi nang du thim pa'o //
T02D1511:317b-37: de'i dus su nam mkha'i thig bzhin du sa la
T02D1511:317b-38: tshangs pa'i thig gnyis lag pa gnyis mnyam du bab
T02D1511:317b-41: dang po gshin rjer kha bltas te //
T02D1511:317b-42: 'khor lo'i sa yi byang du gnas //
T02D1511:317b-43: mkha' dang sa la thig gdab bya //
T02D1511:317b-44: blo ldan dang bcas g-yon skor du //
T02D1511:318a-2: slar yang tshangs pa'i thig gnyis la //
T02D1511:318a-3: mer gnas nub tu kha bltas pas //
T02D1511:318a-4: lho yi char ni thig gdab bya //
T02D1511:318a-5: rlung nas shar du kha bltas bas //
T02D1511:318a-6: byang gi char ni gdab par bya'o //
T02D1511:318a-7: slob dpon bskor te rlung gnas shing //
T02D1511:318a-8: lhor ni mngon du phyogs par bya'o //
T02D1511:318a-9: nub kyi char ni btab nas su //
T02D1511:318a-10: sngags pa byang du mngon phyogs shing //
T02D1511:318a-11: mi yi gnas su gnas pa yis //
T02D1511:318a-12: shar gyi cha thig brtsam par bya //
T02D1511:318a-13: me la sogs par gnas pa yis //
T02D1511:318a-14: mtshams kyi thig ni gdab bar bya //
T02D1511:318a-15: phyogs sogs dbye ba shes nas su //
T02D1511:318a-16: thig gdab pa ni brtsam par bya //
T02D1511:318a-18: de la thog mar mandala khru gang ba'i dkyil du
T02D1511:318a-19: btsugs pa'i grib tshod kyi shing bu mtho gang pa'i
T02D1511:318a-20: grib ma nyin mtshan mnyam pa'i dus su nang du
T02D1511:318a-21: 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i rtse mo dkyil
T02D1511:318a-22: 'khor gyi re kh'a'i dkyil du gang 'jug pa der
T02D1511:318a-23: thig le gnyis byas pa ni nub pa dang shar
T02D1511:318a-24: 'jug pa dang / yin no // de'i steng du
T02D1511:318a-25: skud pa khru gang pa bzung la mandala gnyis byas
T02D1511:318a-27: mjug ma dang kha'i mthar byas pa'i thig le lho
T02D1511:318a-28: dang byang gi steng du srad bu bzung ste mandala
T02D1511:318a-29: gzhan gnyis bya'o // dkyil 'khor ma byas par 'char
T02D1511:318a-30: ba'i dang nub pa'i tshe sor bcu gnyis pa'i shing
T02D1511:318a-31: gi grib ma'i rtse mor byas pa'i thig le gnyis
T02D1511:318a-32: dus rtag tu nub dang shar yin no zhes pa
T02D1511:318a-33: gzhan gnyis bya'o // man ngag go // thog yod
T02D1511:318a-34: pa'i sa ru phyogs bzhir thig le bzhi byas la
T02D1511:318a-35: sngar bzhin mandala bzhi byas te /
T02D1511:318a-36: de la phyogs kun du nya'i kha dang mjug ma'i
T02D1511:318a-37: dkyil du bzung nas me ri'i mtha'i bar du tshangs

T02D1511:318a-48: slob ma 'chi bar bshad pa yin //
T02D1511:318b-1: / sgo yi nyi shu yi ni cha'i //
T02D1511:318b-2: skud pas dpal ldan he ru ka'i //
T02D1511:318b-3: bdag nyid lus kyis mkhas pas bri //

T02D1511:318b-9: brgyad pa'o // de'i phyi rol du cha chung bcu gnyis dang /
T02D1511:318b-14: bzhi nyid du rim gyis rta babs dang /
T02D1511:318b-18: gnyis rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /

T02D1511:318b-20: logs gnyis par yang de ltar ro //
T02D1511:318b-21: zhes pas thig skud cha chung dgu bcu rtsa drug tu 'gyur ro //
T02D1511:318b-22: 'khor lo'i brgyad cha ni sgo ste de'i bzhi cha chung ngo //
T02D1511:318b-23: tshangs pa'i gzhogs gnyis su cha chung gnyis gnyis rtsa
T02D1511:318b-24: ba'i thig gis dang lhan cig cha chung bzhi pa'i
T02D1511:318b-25: sgo bcom ldan 'das kyi skus g-yon pa dang g-yas
T02D1511:318b-26: pa'i mig gnyis kyi yi ges zla ba dang nyi
T02D1511:318b-27: mar bsgoms la / khro bo'i lta bas kun du

T02D1511:318b-29: rnam bar 'ching ba'i sgrib par gyur pa dbyi bar
T02D1511:318b-30: bya'o zhes lhag par mos pas dbyi bar bya'o //
T02D1511:318b-32: rtsa ba'i thig gi phyi rol du go rims bzhin du gcig dang /
T02D1511:318b-37: gcig gi bar dor nas thig drug ni mtshams kyi thig las thad kar 'thon pa ste /
T02D1511:318b-38: de la dang po ni panytsa ri kh'a'i'o //
T02D1511:318b-39: gnyis pa ni gar gyi snam bu ste de gnyis
T02D1511:318b-40: kyi rtse mo la reg pa'i cha bcu gnyis pa'i
T02D1511:318b-41: thig dang ldan pa'i tshangs thig nas /

T02D1511:318b-43: gsum pa ni rin chen pa gu dang dra ba dra phyed dang ;
T02D1511:318b-44: rin chen shar bu rnams kyis ste cha chung brgyad spang bar ro //
T02D1511:318b-45: gzhan ni zur thig gzhan gyi bar du ste mda' yab kyi'o //

T02D1511:318b-47: de la gcig ni dar dpyangs kyi sa ste thad ka'i thig gsum gyi rtse mo la reg pa'o //
T02D1511:319a-1: gzhogs su cha chung re re'i bar du rta babs
T02D1511:319a-2: kyi ga ba dang bar snang dang rdul tshon gyis
T02D1511:319a-3: ste gsum mo // bzhi po 'di rnams las dang po gsum ni srid du cha chung lnga pa'o //
T02D1511:319a-4: bzhi pa ni cha chung bzhi'o //
T02D1511:319a-5: dkyil 'khor dang rta babs kyi bar snang gi sa ni mun pa'i snam bur yang brjod do //
T02D1511:319a-6: de nas tshangs thig gi logs su cha chung gnyis
T02D1511:319a-7: spangs par rtsa ba'i thig nas sgo khyud cha chung

T02D1511:319a-16: gzhan de'i logs kyi thig gi rtse mo'i bar du
T02D1511:319a-17: cha chung bcu pa panytsa re kh'a'i thig gcig go
T02D1511:319a-18: // de'i phyi cha chung gcig ni bar snang gi snam bu'o //

T02D1511:319a-20: bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor la ni logs kyi steng gi bar ro //
T02D1511:319a-21: gdung gi 'og tu yang ka ba gnyis ma bris

T02D1511:319a-25: logs kyi ka ba ni rta babs rnams kho na'i'o //
T02D1511:319a-26: rdul tshon gyi rtsig pa la ni rin po che dang /
T02D1511:319a-30: mda' yab rnams rim gyis steng nas steng du gnas pa'o //
T02D1511:319a-31: rin chen shar bu thog gi mtha' nas 'phyang ba'o //
T02D1511:319a-32: ka ba'i steng du rta babs ni cha chung bcu gnyis so //
T02D1511:319a-33: de la ka ba'i rtse mo'i phyi rol du thig bcu gcig ste bar rnams su gser dang /
T02D1511:319a-34: rin po che'i shar bu dang /
T02D1511:319a-40: rin po cha'i shar bu dang /
T02D1511:319a-43: mda' yab kyi snam bu rnams so //
T02D1511:319a-44: de rnams kyi mun pa'i snam bu gnyis ni so
T02D1511:319a-45: sor dpangs su cha chung phyed dang gnyis te snam
T02D1511:319a-46: bu dgu ni so sor cha chung re re'o //
T02D1511:319b-0: bcu gcig po 'di'i thad ka'i @319b tshad ni ;

T02D1511:319b-20: cha chung phyed nas de bzhin gzhan //

T02D1511:319b-24: de'i steng du thig dang po cha chung phyed dang bzhi pa'o //

T02D1511:319b-28: cha chung gsum dor bar drug pa cha chung lnga pa'o //

T02D1511:320a-29: rje phreng ba'i thig ste sra zhing 'thas pa 'khor

T02D1511:324b-43: ldan 'das kyi dam tshig gi 'khor lo la ye
T02D1511:324b-45: bsad gtor la sogs pa dang me tog la sogs

T02D1511:324b-48: lha re re la yang ngo //
T02D1511:324b-49: de la zhu ba ni me lha'i kha la'o //
T02D1511:324b-50: yam shing dang ku sha la sogs pa 'ong la'o //

T02D1511:325a-1: mdun du zhi ba'i sems kyis ji ltar nus pa dbul lo //

T02D1511:325a-8: g-yon gyi khu tshur gyis bzung la re res lan

T02D1511:325a-19: mar me'i sdong bu dang bcas pa'i zan gyi chang bu rnams kyis so //

T02D1511:325a-37: slob ma lho ru kha bltas la //

T02D1511:325a-39: bu rnams nges par gnas pa yis //
T02D1511:325a-40: sdom pa'i mchog ni bsrung bar mdzod //
T02D1511:325a-41: sdom pa'i dbang las lhag pa med //
T02D1511:325a-42: lhan skyes thabs kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1511:325a-43: de dag gis mandala byas te pus mo sa la
T02D1511:325a-44: btsugs te snyim pa sbyar ba me tog dang bcas
T02D1511:325b-0: pa rnams @325b rang gi kha nas lus la bcug
T02D1511:325b-1: ste rdo rje'i lam nas shes rab kyi padma la

T02D1511:325b-6: kyis dbang bskur bar bsgoms nas bton te lho'i sgor
T02D1511:325b-7: gnas pa rnams kyis gsol ba 'debs su gzhug go
T02D1511:325b-8: // bdag gi ston pa dpa' bo che //

T02D1511:325b-25: gsang sngags spyod tshul cho ga ni //

T02D1511:325b-27: dus gsum sangs rgyas 'byung ba yi //

T02D1511:325b-33: sangs rgyas la gus skye bo dga' //
T02D1511:325b-34: rtsa ba'i ltung ba yongs spangs shing //
T02D1511:325b-35: sbom po'i ltung ba spang bar bya //
T02D1511:325b-36: sems can rnams ni mnyes par bya //
T02D1511:325b-37: theg pa dman la 'dod mi bya //
T02D1511:325b-38: zhes yang dag par len du bcug la /
T02D1511:325b-39: dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi //
T02D1511:325b-40: sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags //
T02D1511:325b-41: 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang //
T02D1511:325b-42: sangs rgyas byang chub yid kyis bzung //
T02D1511:325b-43: zhes lan gsum 'don du gzhug go //

T02D1511:325b-45: phyir mo ldog pa 'khor lo'i dbang //
T02D1511:325b-46: zhes pa la sogs pas gsol ba 'debs su bcug la /
T02D1511:326a-1: sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes
T02D1511:326a-2: pa la sogs pa lan gsum 'don du gzhug go
T02D1511:326a-3: // de nas las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis bsrungs nas da rnams kyi snying ga dang /
T02D1511:326a-4: mgo bo rnams su rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo'i steng du h'um nag po dang /
T02D1511:326a-6: aom dkar po rnams bsams nas brjod cing dri'i chu
T02D1511:326a-7: dang bcas pa'i rdo rje g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis
T02D1511:326a-8: de'i gnas gsum du reg nas mgo bo la me
T02D1511:326a-9: tog dang / mdun du spos dang /
T02D1511:326a-10: mar me dang snying gar dri byin nas byang chub
T02D1511:326a-11: shing la sogs pa'i shing sor bcu gnyis pa drang
T02D1511:326a-12: zhing srog chags med pa ma gas pa rma med
T02D1511:326a-13: pa / dri bzang po'i chus bkrus pa rtse mo la me tog bcings pa /
T02D1511:326a-14: kha byang du phyogs pas slob ma rnams la sbyin no //
T02D1511:326a-15: de rnams kyis kyang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa pa'i
T02D1511:326a-16: lci bas byugs par byang dam shar du phyogs pas
T02D1511:326a-17: so // shing de aom badzra h'a sa ham zhes
T02D1511:326a-18: brjod cing rtse mo 'chos te gyen du blta zhing
T02D1511:326a-20: de'i rtse mo ltung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas /

T02D1511:326a-25: // phyi rol du ltung na dngos grub med do //

T02D1511:326a-27: las thams cad pa lan bdun bzlas pa'i dri'i chu khyor gsum /

T02D1511:326a-29: bi sho dha ya sarba bi ka la pan aa
T02D1511:326a-31: zhes brjod cing 'thung du gzhug go //
T02D1511:326a-32: phyi rol du 'dug tu bcug la h'um las byung
T02D1511:326a-33: ba las thams cad pa bzlas pa'i ku sha ma
T02D1511:326a-34: nyams pa bting nas nyal ba'i don du dang /
T02D1511:326a-35: dhi yig las skyes pa gcig sdas kyi don du /
T02D1511:326a-36: aom badzra t'ikshna bam zhes pas sbyin no //
T02D1511:326a-37: skud pa dmar po slob ma'i lus kyi tshad tsam
T02D1511:326a-38: pa sum lta ba tu byas te h'um yig dang
T02D1511:326a-39: las thams cad pa lan bdun du bzlas la mdud
T02D1511:326a-40: pa gsum du byas te slob ma rnams kyi dpung
T02D1511:326a-41: pa g-yon par aom buddha mee tri raksha sarb'a na
T02D1511:326b-0: sv'a h'a / zhes pas @326b bcings te yang dag par bsrungs la spro ba bskyed de /
T02D1511:326b-1: spyod mchog 'di la gang rnams kyi //

T02D1511:326b-3: de rnams ngan song sdug bsngal kun //
T02D1511:326b-4: rab tu 'byung ba yang dag zhi //
T02D1511:326b-6: bzlas pa'i don du las kun gyi sngags byin te
T02D1511:326b-7: bsrungs la snga dro rmi lam bdag la smros shig
T02D1511:326b-8: byas la seng ge'i nyal stabs kyis nyal du gzhug
T02D1511:326b-9: go // rang yang de bzlas pa ni slob ma lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1511:326b-10: snga dro gtor ma phul te dkyil 'khor gyi khang
T02D1511:326b-11: pa las byung ste slob ma rnams ma rmi lam

T02D1511:326b-13: dge ba'i rmi lam yin na las thams cad pa'i
T02D1511:326b-15: dkyil 'khor khang par 'jug pa'i tshe slob dpon rnams

T02D1511:326b-19: rtham dza:h'um bam ho:pra siddhya sva zhes pas gzengs bstod

T02D1511:326b-21: phyug gi skus byang la sogs pa'i sgor gnas nas

T02D1511:326b-30: sngags kyis dkyil 'khor du dor nas /

T02D1511:326b-33: dbang phyug bla mar lhag par mos pa des ster

T02D1511:326b-36: ba dang / slob dpon gyis las thams cad la

T02D1511:326b-38: bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid shes rab dang thabs
T02D1511:326b-39: kyi rang bzhin de kho na nyid kyi bstod pa

T02D1511:327a-2: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //

T02D1511:327a-29: 'dod chags kun ni 'dod yon lnga yis sems can mnyes par byed pa'o //

T02D1511:327a-40: aom badzra aushn'i sha h'um phat /
