T02D1511:328a-6: / sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi
T02D1511:328a-7: nya khanda ro d'a ry'a pra brta ya ntu m'am
T02D1511:328a-8: / / spyi gtsug tu thal mo sbyar te nub tu'o //
T02D1511:328a-9: aom sarba b'i ra yo gi n'i bhya:p'u dz'a karma ne a'atna n'am ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D1511:328a-10: sarba ta th'a ga ta b'i ra yo gi ni r'u pi ni ry'a ya karma ka yantu ;
T02D1511:328a-13: aom gu ru tsa ra na au pa stha n'a ya a'atma n'i ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D1511:328a-14: aom sarba tva pa ri tra na ya a'atma n'a ni ry'a ta y'a mi /
T02D1511:328a-15: zhes don dang ldan pa 'don du gzhug go //
T02D1511:328a-16: de nas lho sgor lhor kha bltas te /
T02D1511:328a-17: kye bu khyod kyang rab tu gnas //
T02D1511:328a-18: de nyid snang ba'i rigs la ni //
T02D1511:328a-19: dpa' bo lha mo rnams skye ba'i //
T02D1511:328a-20: he ru ka yi rnam pas mdzes //
T02D1511:328a-21: skyes bu gang zhig skyes nas su //
T02D1511:328a-23: ye shes sdom pa'i dag pa ste //
T02D1511:328a-24: bdag gis khyed la sbyin pa yin //
T02D1511:328a-25: dkyil 'khor ma mthong mi rnams la //
T02D1511:328a-26: khyod kyis kyang ni smra mi bya //
T02D1511:328a-27: gal te smra na de'i tshe bu //
T02D1511:328a-28: dam tshig nyams par byed par 'gyur //
T02D1511:328a-29: mgo bor rdo rje bzhag ste dril bu dkrol zhing /
T02D1511:328a-30: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje yin
T02D1511:328a-31: te tshul 'di 'ga' zhig la smras na 'dis khyod
T02D1511:328a-32: kyi mgo 'gas par byed do zhes nyan du bcug
T02D1511:328a-33: la snying gar rdo rje bzung la /
T02D1511:328a-34: de ring phag mo rang nyid dpal //
T02D1511:328a-35: khyod kyi snying gar yang dag gnas //
T02D1511:328a-36: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02D1511:328a-37: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02D1511:328a-39: ming med dang mthe bos bzung ba'i dung gi chus ma na'i tshul du /
T02D1511:328a-40: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02D1511:328a-41: de tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02D1511:328a-42: de tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02D1511:328a-43: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'thung cig / aom panytsa
T02D1511:328a-44: aa mri ta au da ka tha tha h'um zhes
T02D1511:328a-45: pa'i tshigs su bcad pa dang sngags kyis bdud rtsi
T02D1511:328a-47: de ring nas brtsams te khyod kyi dpal rdo rje
T02D1511:328a-48: phag mo nga yin gyis ngas gang bsgom de 'bad
T02D1511:328a-49: par gyis shig / khyod kyis nga la smad par
T02D1511:328a-51: kha na ba ma thob ma spangs par tshe dus
T02D1511:328b-0: byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur @328b ta re
T02D1511:328b-1: zhes brjod do // de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor
T02D1511:328b-2: la phyogs pa la khyod kyi mig la ci lta
T02D1511:328b-3: bu'i snang ba mthong zhes dris nas /
T02D1511:328b-8: nag po snang ba rnams kyis go rim sa bzhin du zhi ba dang /
T02D1511:328b-11: mngon spyod kyi skal pa dang ldan par shes par byas nas /
T02D1511:328b-12: de mthe bong gnyis nas g-yon pas bzung nas rdo
T02D1511:328b-13: rje'i 'gros kyis las thams cad bzlas shing g-yon skor
T02D1511:328b-14: du bskor ba gsum byed du bcug nas bden pa'i
T02D1511:328b-18: slob ma 'di ni yang dag gzhug / lha rnams rigs kyi rim pa ni //
T02D1511:328b-19: bsod nams ji ltar 'di la shog / ces pas slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga'o /
T02D1511:328b-21: // / sngar bzung ba'i phreng ba yi ge h'um gis
T02D1511:328b-22: bsngags pa las ma rnyings shing yang ba'i me tog
T02D1511:328b-23: cing blangs te de'i lag pa thal mo sbyar bar
T02D1511:328b-24: sbyin par bya'o // de'i tshe de nyid kyang yi
T02D1511:328b-25: ge gsum gyis 'od gsal zhing sdig pa bkrus par
T02D1511:328b-26: mos nas bla mas de ltar byin gyis brlabs nas
T02D1511:328b-27: gus pa sngon du 'gro bas dkyil 'khor pa dang
T02D1511:328b-28: bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbang phyug mdun na gnas
T02D1511:328b-29: pa bzhin du dmigs nas dkyil 'khor der yid kyis
T02D1511:328b-30: sbyin par bya'o // zhugs te / aom tashthi badzra
T02D1511:328b-31: dri dho me bha wa sh'a shva to me bha
T02D1511:328b-32: ba hri da yam me aa dhi tishtha sarba siddhi
T02D1511:328b-33: mme pra ya tstsha h'um ha ha ha ha ho
T02D1511:328b-34: sbyin par bya'o // zhugs te / / a'a:kham b'i
T02D1511:328b-35: ra h'um pra t'i tstsha ku su ma aanytsa li
T02D1511:328b-36: sbyin par bya'o // zhugs te / / n'a tha
T02D1511:328b-37: ho:/ zhes brjod cing mig la sogs pa bsdams nas
T02D1511:328b-38: de'i dbu la me tog dor bar bya'o //
T02D1511:328b-39: re kh'a lnga'i nang du me tog lhung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas rigs bstan par bya'o //
T02D1511:328b-41: mdzod spu'am dbu'am gtsug tor la lhung na phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub po //
T02D1511:328b-42: spyan nam zhal la ni sngags kyi dngos grub po //
T02D1511:328b-44: lha rnams las ring na yun ring pos so //
T02D1511:328b-45: me tog de aom pra ti grihna tam ai mam satva ma h'a ba la /
T02D1511:328b-46: zhes pas mgo la bcing ngo zhes pa phreng ba'i dbang ngo //
T02D1511:328b-47: slob ma'i snying gar zla ba la bdag po dang /
T02D1511:329a-1: gnyis la 'bar ba dang bcas pa'i aom gnyis bsgoms nas /
T02D1511:329a-2: dpal ldan phag mo rang nyid kyis //
T02D1511:329a-3: khyod kyi mig ni 'byed par brtson //
T02D1511:329a-4: rdo rje mig ni bla med pa //
T02D1511:329a-5: kun du gzigs pas 'byed par mdzod //
T02D1511:329a-6: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:329a-7: aom dzny'a na tsakshu h'um a'a:sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:329a-8: zhes brjod cing gdong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
T02D1511:329a-9: da ni dad pa'i shugs kyis ni //
T02D1511:329a-11: khyod ni rnal 'byor ma rigs skyes //
T02D1511:329a-12: phyag rgya sngags kyis byin gyis brlabs //
T02D1511:329a-13: yon phul te phyag byas nas gcig pur 'dug pa'i slob mas bla ma la gsol ba gdab ste /
T02D1511:329a-14: bsam du med pa'i chos kyi snod //
T02D1511:329a-15: dbang bskur ba ni bdag mdzod cig / bla ma yis ni lho sgo ru //
T02D1511:329a-16: he ru ka yi bdag nyid sems /
T02D1511:329a-17: seng ge'i gdan la gzhag pa'am //
T02D1511:329a-18: sna tshogs padma'i shing ste gsal //
T02D1511:329a-19: phyag rgya lnga ldan slob ma de //
T02D1511:329a-20: kha tv'am ga ni thogs gnas la //
T02D1511:329a-21: steng du lha mos gdugs bzung pa //
T02D1511:329a-22: g-yas pa da ma ru thogs pa //
T02D1511:329a-23: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' tshogs kyis //
T02D1511:329a-24: bskor ba'i dkyil du gnas pa ni //
T02D1511:329a-25: glu dang bkra shis la sogs pa //
T02D1511:329a-26: 'bad pas yang dag mchod nas su //
T02D1511:329a-27: sngar bshad rim pas byur bsal bya //
T02D1511:329a-28: rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs chu //
T02D1511:329a-29: blangs nas thod par byas nas su //
T02D1511:329a-30: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje dang //
T02D1511:329a-31: de las byung ba'i mi bskyod pa //
T02D1511:329a-32: des mtshan pa'i rang bzhin gyi chu bas mas la
T02D1511:329a-33: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i ye shes sems
T02D1511:329a-35: snying ga'i 'od zer gyis phyogs mtha' yas pa na gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T02D1511:329a-36: rig pa'i lha mo rnams yang dag par mchod nas slob ma la dbang bskur ba'i don du /
T02D1511:329a-37: rdo rje gyis sangs rgyas la //
T02D1511:329a-38: 'gro ba bskyab pa'i ched du dbang //
T02D1511:329a-39: yon tan 'byung gnas ji ltar gsol //
T02D1511:329a-40: de ltar 'di la stsal du gsol //
T02D1511:329a-42: de dag shes rab ma dang snyoms par zhugs te
T02D1511:329a-43: 'dod chags chen pos zhu bar gyur nas rnam par
T02D1511:329a-44: snang mdzad kyi sgo nas nang du zhugs nas rdo
T02D1511:329a-45: rje lam nas 'thon te khu ba de lha mo'i
T02D1511:329b-0: padma'i @329b kha nas nang du bcug pa'i slob ma
T02D1511:329b-1: skad cig gis stong pa nyid kyi rjes la h'um
T02D1511:329b-2: dang rdo rje las byung ba'i yum dang bcas pa'i
T02D1511:329b-3: mi bskyod pa'i rang bzhin ye shes sems dpa' dang
T02D1511:329b-4: tha mi dad pa la dbang bskur nas /
T02D1511:329b-5: yang phyag dang zhabs la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis padma
T02D1511:329b-6: las 'thon te gnas pa'i slob ma la nam mkha'
T02D1511:329b-7: gang bar gnas pa'i yum dang bcas pa'i rdo rje
T02D1511:329b-8: can rnams kyis gur ku ma la sogs pa'i cha
T02D1511:329b-9: dang / byang chub kyi sems bdud rtsis gang ba'i
T02D1511:329b-10: thod pa rnams phyag gis cung zad gzhol bas dbang
T02D1511:329b-12: mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pas bkra shis gang zhig ces pa la sogs pa'i bkra shis brjod cing /
T02D1511:329b-13: dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1511:329b-14: zhes pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1511:329b-15: aom shr'i tsakra b'i ra tvam aa bhi shanyts'i mi /
T02D1511:329b-16: aom badzra au da ka aa bhi shanytsi h'um su
T02D1511:329b-17: ra ta stvam aa h'um zhes pas dbang bskur ro
T02D1511:329b-18: // de de'i tshe bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1511:329b-20: gsol ba btab pa dang ldan pa'i slob ma aom
T02D1511:329b-21: dang rin po che las skyes pa'i rin chen 'byung
T02D1511:329b-22: ldan gyi gzugs ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi
T02D1511:329b-23: dad par bsams nas chu'i dbang las gsungs pa'i snying
T02D1511:329b-24: ga'i 'od zer gyis phyogs mtha' yas pa la sogs
T02D1511:329b-28: ming gi dbang du yang ngo //
T02D1511:329b-29: 'dir khyad par du gser la sogs pa las byas
T02D1511:329b-30: pa'i dbu rgyan cod pan rin chen 'byung ldan las
T02D1511:329b-31: byas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi dad
T02D1511:329b-32: pa slob ma'i rigs kyi bdag po dbus na gnas
T02D1511:329b-33: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lngas byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1511:329b-34: de'i mgo la bskon zhing steng du /
T02D1511:329b-35: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02D1511:329b-37: aom satva badzri aa bhi shanytsi bhrum /
T02D1511:329b-39: aom ratna badzri aa bhi shanytsi tr'am /
T02D1511:329b-41: aom dharm'a badzri aa bhi shanytsi hr'i:/
T02D1511:329b-43: aom karma badzri aa bhi shanytsi aa:/
T02D1511:329b-44: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warnna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:329b-45: aom a'a:badzra mu ku ta aa bhi shanytsi h'um su ra ta stvam aa ham zhes brjod do //
T02D1511:329b-47: hr'i:yig las skyes shing des mtshan pa'i padma yongs su
T02D1511:329b-48: gyur pa'i snang ba mtha' yas kyi rang bzhin rdo
T02D1511:330a-1: ltar rdzogs pa'i slob ma'i snying ga dang /
T02D1511:330a-3: mgo bo rnams su rdo rje rig nas /
T02D1511:330a-4: he ru ka dpal dpa' sogs kyis //
T02D1511:330a-5: de ring khyod la dbang bskur ro //
T02D1511:330a-6: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1511:330a-7: rab tu grub phyir rdo rje zung //
T02D1511:330a-8: zhes brjod cing snying ga dang lag pa g-yas par sbyin no //
T02D1511:330a-10: kham dang ral gri las skyes pa'i don yod grub
T02D1511:330a-11: pa'i ngo bo ye shes sems dpa' dang tha mi
T02D1511:330a-12: dad pa'i slob ma dang dril bu bsams te /
T02D1511:330a-13: de'i lag pa g-yon par dril bu /
T02D1511:330a-14: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02D1511:330a-15: dril bu dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror ldan //
T02D1511:330a-16: byang chub mchog tu rgyal ba bzhed //
T02D1511:330a-17: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung //
T02D1511:330a-19: rdo rje dang dril bu thogs pa'i lag pa gnyis 'khyud pa'i stangs byed du bcug la /
T02D1511:330a-20: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam
T02D1511:330a-21: aa bhi shanyts'i mi tishtha b'i ra sa ma ya
T02D1511:330a-24: bcom ldan bzung ngo ba dag la ni //
T02D1511:330a-25: yang dag nye bar gyur bar mdzod //
T02D1511:330a-28: de ltar gsol ba btab par gyur pa /
T02D1511:330a-29: aom dang 'khor lo las byung ba'i rnam par snang
T02D1511:330a-30: mdzad kyi rang bzhin ye shes dang tha mi dad
T02D1511:330a-31: pa spyi bor rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam por
T02D1511:330a-33: aom shr'i he ru ka aa dhi pa ti stvam /
T02D1511:330a-34: aa bhi shanyts'i mi shr'i he ru ka n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02D1511:330a-35: zhe sdang rdo rje khyod ces pa dang /
T02D1511:330a-36: gti mug rdo rje khyod ces pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1511:330a-37: me tog lhung ba'i rigs kyi ming dam rnam par
T02D1511:330a-38: snang mdzad kyi bdag nyid kyis dbang bskur ro //
T02D1511:330a-40: rdor sems rnam rgyal dpe med dang //
T02D1511:330a-41: ye shes sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02D1511:330a-42: lhan skyes lus med dga' ba dang //
T02D1511:330a-43: dang po mchog rdor aa la la //
T02D1511:330a-44: mi bskyod bzhad pa 'gyid pa dang //
T02D1511:330a-45: rang byung zhe sdang h'um mdzad dang //
T02D1511:330a-46: rdo rje rol pa sgeg pa dang //
T02D1511:330a-47: dga' pa dgyes pa sems rdo rje //
T02D1511:330a-48: rnam snang sku dang sangs rgyas gzugs //
T02D1511:330a-49: sgyu ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang //
T02D1511:330a-50: rin chen yid bzhin nor bu dang //
T02D1511:330a-51: nga rgyal dang ni gzi brjid dang //
T02D1511:330b-2: 'dod chags chos dang spyan ras gzigs //
T02D1511:330b-3: don yod las dang dam tshig rlung //
T02D1511:330b-4: phrag dog reg bya pha rol byin //
T02D1511:330b-5: rdo rje dbyings dbang phreng ba ma //
T02D1511:330b-6: myong ma shugs ma rnam rol ma //
T02D1511:330b-7: bdag med lag ma m'a ma k'i //
T02D1511:330b-8: sdang dang dga' ma phreng ma 'od //
T02D1511:330b-9: spyan ma dkar mo mkha' 'gro ma //
T02D1511:330b-10: sgeg ma rdo rje gti mug dga' //
T02D1511:330b-11: 'bar ma phreng ma nam mkha' dga' //
T02D1511:330b-12: do shal rdo rje dbugs 'byin ma //
T02D1511:330b-13: gos dkar bzhad ma 'dod chags dga' //
T02D1511:330b-14: glu ma 'dod chags ro langs ma //
T02D1511:330b-15: rdo rje ngo mtshar brngo ba ma //
T02D1511:330b-16: sgrol ma sgyu ma gar dbang phyug / bsgyings ma rdo rje dga' ma'o //
T02D1511:330b-18: dbang lnga po 'di dag ni ma rig pa'i gnyen
T02D1511:330b-19: po yin pas rig pa'i dbang ste lus kyi rnam
T02D1511:330b-20: par dag pa'o // 'di dag gis dbang bskur ba
T02D1511:330b-21: ni bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud nyan pa dang
T02D1511:330b-22: par dag pa'o // bshad pa dang / sngags bsgrub pa la dbang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1511:330b-24: chu ni shin tu rnam dag yin //
T02D1511:330b-25: cod pan mnyan pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1511:330b-26: rdo rje rtag tu so sor rtog / ming gi me long ye shes yin //
T02D1511:330b-27: dril bu bya ba nan tan no //
T02D1511:330b-29: / rang gi snying po la sogs pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te /
T02D1511:330b-30: bcom ldan bdag gis sbyin lags kyis //
T02D1511:330b-31: 'di la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D1511:330b-32: zhes brjod cing snying gnas kha'i sgo nas byung ste /
T02D1511:330b-33: rna ba g-yas pa nas snying gar zhugs pa bsam zhing sngags sbyin te /
T02D1511:330b-35: bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis //
T02D1511:330b-36: bdag la nye bar mdzad du gsol //
T02D1511:330b-39: h'um las skyes pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du bsams nas /
T02D1511:330b-40: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad nyid //
T02D1511:330b-41: he ru ka yi phyag na gnas //
T02D1511:330b-42: he ru ka dpal brtul bzhugs brtan //
T02D1511:330b-43: khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung /
T02D1511:330b-44: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya /
T02D1511:330b-45: tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra y'a mi hi hi hi hi h'i:/
T02D1511:330b-46: zhes brjod cing de nyid kyis gzung du gzhug go zhes pa rdo rje'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1511:331a-1: mchog gi snying po'i sngags kyis kha tv'am ga dang
T02D1511:331a-2: cang te'u dang padma'i snod rnams la lan gsum du
T02D1511:331a-3: bzlas la / he ru ka dpal phyag rgya 'di //
T02D1511:331a-4: phyi nang yang dag gnas pa nyid //
T02D1511:331a-5: de nas kha tv'am cang te'u snod //
T02D1511:331a-6: sbyin pa dpa' pos gzung bar gyis //
T02D1511:331a-7: zhes pas 'dzin du gzhug go zhes pa spyod pa'i brtul zhugs so //
T02D1511:331a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod lam gyi tshul du byas
T02D1511:331a-9: nas chos gos kyi grva bzung ba'i khu tshur g-yon
T02D1511:331a-10: pa snying gar bzung zhing g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i
T02D1511:331a-11: phyag rgyas / 'dir bdag 'khor lo gsum dbang phyug / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin dngos //
T02D1511:331a-12: he ru ka dpal ming can gyi //
T02D1511:331a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa khyod lung bstan //
T02D1511:331a-14: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i grub pa ste /
T02D1511:331a-15: me tog lhung ba'i rigs kyi ming gi de bzhin
T02D1511:331a-16: gshegs pa'i tshul can slob ma kye che ge mo
T02D1511:331a-17: rdo rje ta th'a ga ta siddhya:sa ma ya stvam
T02D1511:331a-18: bhur bhu ba sva:/ khams gsum gyis ni rgyal po che //
T02D1511:331a-19: bdag po dpal ldan yon tan gter //
T02D1511:331a-20: bdud kyi sde kun pham byas nas //
T02D1511:331a-21: grong khyer mchog tu khyod rab zhugs //
T02D1511:331a-22: zhes brjod de lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D1511:331a-23: de ltar lung bstan pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1511:331a-24: thams cad kyis rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston
T02D1511:331a-25: te dang par bya'o zhes lung bstan pa'o //
T02D1511:331a-26: mtshan ma med pa'i 'gro ba'i don //
T02D1511:331a-27: da lta gang gis byed 'gyur pa //
T02D1511:331a-28: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang bskur che //
T02D1511:331a-29: dpa' po chen po bdag la stsol //
T02D1511:331a-30: zhes pas gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D1511:331a-31: rdo rje dang h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul du bsams la /
T02D1511:331a-32: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1511:331a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02D1511:331a-34: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02D1511:331a-35: rdo rje snyems tshul bdag bo'i bdag / bcom ldan
T02D1511:331a-36: 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o zhes brjod cing
T02D1511:331a-38: 'di des sangs rgyas la sogs pas //
T02D1511:331a-40: phyag rgya 'di ni dam tshig brjod //
T02D1511:331a-41: yid kyi sku ni brtan pa'i phyir //
T02D1511:331a-42: gang gi sku ni ma lus brtan //
T02D1511:331a-43: des ni phyag rgya rab tu brjod //
T02D1511:331a-44: ces pa ste rdo rje dril bu dang bcas pa'i
T02D1511:331a-45: lag pa gnyis kyis ye shes kyi phyag rgya la
T02D1511:331b-0: 'khyud pa nas gnas pa @331b rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1511:331b-1: tshul du bsams te chu'i dbang las gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1511:331b-2: gas / dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje che //
T02D1511:331b-3: khams gsum pa yis phyag byas pa //
T02D1511:331b-4: gsang gsum gnas las byung ba yi //
T02D1511:331b-5: sangs rgyas kun gyis sbyin par bya //
T02D1511:331b-6: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma shri ye h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:331b-7: zhes brjod de dbang bskur ro //
T02D1511:331b-8: spyi bor mi bskyod pa bsams la gzhan rgyal ba
T02D1511:331b-9: dang lha mo rnams de nyid la ye shes sems
T02D1511:331b-10: dpa'i chul du thim bar byas nas /
T02D1511:331b-11: aom su pra ti shthi badzre sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:331b-12: zhes pas byin gyis brlabs nas me tog la sogs
T02D1511:331b-13: pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o des gsungs
T02D1511:331b-14: pa / bcu drug bdag nyid shes rab ma //
T02D1511:331b-15: lag pa gnyis kyis bzung nas ni //
T02D1511:331b-16: rdo rje dril bu sbyor ba las //
T02D1511:331b-17: slob dpon gyi ni dbang du 'dod //
T02D1511:331b-20: dpa' bo dpa' mo'i dbang phyug grong //
T02D1511:331b-21: rang bzhin dag pa sangs rgyas bdag / lus kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1511:331b-22: dri ma med pa bu khyod ltos //
T02D1511:331b-23: gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa bdag nyid
T02D1511:331b-24: kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs
T02D1511:331b-25: kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rang bzhin rtsa
T02D1511:331b-26: sum cu rtsa bdun dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'khor lo
T02D1511:331b-27: dpal he ru ka'i yan lag dang nyid lag nye
T02D1511:331b-29: phyir mi ldog pa'i dbang ngo //
T02D1511:331b-30: gser ram dngul gyi snod la bzhag pa'i mar dang
T02D1511:331b-31: sprang gi mig sman gser gyi thur mas slob ma'i
T02D1511:331b-32: mig gnyis la pram bsams te /
T02D1511:331b-33: aom badzra ni tra aa pa ha ra ba ta lam hr'i:/
T02D1511:331b-34: zhes byug pa ni thur ma'i dbang ngo //
T02D1511:331b-35: aa yig gis bsngags pa'i me long slob ma la bstan zhing /
T02D1511:331b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' me long ltar //
T02D1511:331b-37: dag cing gsal la dri ma med //
T02D1511:331b-38: sangs rgyas kun bdag rang bzhin du //
T02D1511:331b-39: kye bu khyod kyi snying la gnas //
T02D1511:331b-40: ngo bo med cing gnas med pa'i //
T02D1511:331b-41: chos rnams de ltar shes pas su //
T02D1511:331b-42: sems can don ni mnyam med byos //
T02D1511:331b-43: ston pa'i thugs las khyod skyes so //
T02D1511:331b-44: zhes brjod pa ni me long gi dbang ngo //
T02D1511:331b-45: bla ma chen po 'khor lo'i gtso //
T02D1511:331b-46: tshogs 'khor byas te mchod nas su //
T02D1511:331b-47: de nas de la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1511:331b-48: dpa' bos gsang pa'i don gsol gdab //
T02D1511:332a-1: dang skyabs med pa yi skyabs //
T02D1511:332a-2: mgon po rgyu med snying rje che //
T02D1511:332a-3: mgon pos bdag la bka' drin stsol //
T02D1511:332a-4: bde mchog 'khor los bdag la skyobs //
T02D1511:332a-5: ji ltar khyod nyid bdag nyid che //
T02D1511:332a-6: mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar stsol //
T02D1511:332a-8: bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs //
T02D1511:332a-9: zhes pas gsol ba btab la //
T02D1511:332a-10: lang tshol bab pa dam tshig dang ldan pa gsang dbang gi don du bla ma la phul la /
T02D1511:332a-11: bla ma 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rnal 'byor gyis
T02D1511:332a-12: tha mal pa'i bud med kyi gzugs stong pa'i rjes
T02D1511:332a-13: su phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa de dang /
T02D1511:332a-14: rdo rje dang padma'i 'du bya ba sngon du 'gro bas snyoms par zhugs te /
T02D1511:332a-15: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1511:332a-16: na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod
T02D1511:332a-17: cing / snying ga'i sa bon gyi 'od zer gyis spyan drangs pa shes rab dang bcas pa /
T02D1511:332a-18: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa rang la kha
T02D1511:332a-19: nas nang du bcug la 'dod chags chen pos zhu
T02D1511:332a-20: ba aa wa dh'u t'i las 'thon par bsams la
T02D1511:332a-21: rdo rje nor bur lhan skyes brtan par bya ste
T02D1511:332a-22: / mthe bo dang ming med dag gis rdo rje nor bu bzung nas padma las phyung ste /
T02D1511:332a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa zhu ba rang gi byang chub
T02D1511:332a-24: kyi sems dang tha mi dad par lhag par mos
T02D1511:332a-25: pa la gsung rdo rje'i tshul gyi slob ma'i kha
T02D1511:332a-26: ru / 'das pa'i rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis //
T02D1511:332a-27: rgyal sras ji ltar dbang bskur ba //
T02D1511:332a-28: de bzhin du ni byang chub sems //
T02D1511:332a-29: legs par bu khyod dbang bskur ro //
T02D1511:332a-31: dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i sngags brjod cing sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1511:332a-32: des kyang de bzhin gshegs la 'dus pa'i blos aa ho ma h'a su kha /
T02D1511:332a-33: zhes smra zhing btung bar bya'o //
T02D1511:332a-34: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun rdzob byang chub
T02D1511:332a-35: kyi sems gnyis gsang bas dbang bskur bas na gsang
T02D1511:332a-36: ba'i dbang ngo // byang chub rdo rjes zhes pa
T02D1511:332a-37: la sogs pas gsol ba btab pa'i slob ma la
T02D1511:332a-39: 'di ni khyod kyi nyams dga'i gzugs //
T02D1511:332a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyis ster byar gsungs //
T02D1511:332a-41: 'khor lo'i rim pa'i rab sbyor bas //
T02D1511:332a-42: bde ba dam pa yang dag myong //
T02D1511:332a-43: rdo rje skyil krung gis sems ni //
T02D1511:332b-0: nor bu'i @332b nang du gnas blta zhing //
T02D1511:332b-1: zhes rab tu bstan nas gtad do //
T02D1511:332b-2: 'khor lo ni sku la sogs pa'i 'khor lo gsum gyi lha'i tshogs te /
T02D1511:332b-3: de'i rim pas sbyor pa ni dgug pa dang /
T02D1511:332b-5: rdo rje'i lam nas 'thon par byed pa'o //
T02D1511:332b-6: rdo rje skyil krung ni sna bu ga g-yon dang
T02D1511:332b-7: g-yas pa la rgyu ba bkag nas padma'i nang du
T02D1511:332b-8: bltas pa rdo rje nor bu'i nang du gnas pa'i
T02D1511:332b-9: sems ni byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1511:332b-10: shin tu phra bar blta zhing 'od gsal ba'i bde ba myong bar mdzod cig ces pa'o //
T02D1511:332b-11: bud med la dbang bskur na nor bu ni padma'i yin te khyad par ro //
T02D1511:332b-12: des kyang gur kum la sogs pas dri zhim par
T02D1511:332b-13: byas pa'i chu skyes gos med par slob dpon la
T02D1511:332b-14: ston cing / kye ma bdag gis padma 'di //
T02D1511:332b-15: bde ba thams cad yang dag ldan //
T02D1511:332b-16: 'ga' zhig cho gas bsten par byed //
T02D1511:332b-17: de yi mdun na bdag gnas so //
T02D1511:332b-18: sangs rgyas mnyes pa la sogs pa /
T02D1511:332b-19: padmar bya ba ji bzhin gyis //
T02D1511:332b-20: bde chen rgyal po rang nyid ni //
T02D1511:332b-21: 'di nyid du ni rtag tu bzhugs //
T02D1511:332b-22: bha nydza mo ksha ho: zhes brjod do //
T02D1511:332b-23: cho ga ni phag mo'i gzugs su bskyed pa'o //
T02D1511:332b-24: mo ksha zhes pa ni spros pa thams cad dang bral pa ste de ston zhes pa'o //
T02D1511:332b-25: des kyang sngom pa'i sku dang de phag mor bskyed
T02D1511:332b-26: nas rdo rje h'um las byung ba nag po de
T02D1511:332b-27: nor bur cung zad dmar pa'i by'a las byung ba
T02D1511:332b-28: by'a dkar pos rtse mo byin gyis brlabs pa /
T02D1511:332b-29: padma 'dab ma gsum pa aa dmar po las byung
T02D1511:332b-30: ba dy'a dkar po las byung ba'i lte ba rtse
T02D1511:332b-31: mor dya ser bos byin gyis brlabs pa bsams la
T02D1511:332b-32: / g-yon ba'i g-yon ngos su gnas pa'i rtsa rtse
T02D1511:332b-33: mor hr'i: dmar po dang ldan pa'i mdzub mo dang
T02D1511:332b-34: lces sid ces bya zhing bskul nas /
T02D1511:332b-35: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu r'a ga
T02D1511:332b-36: na badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko nya ham zhes
T02D1511:332b-38: nor bu'i rtsa bar sems ni dga' ba tsam skyes te //
T02D1511:332b-39: de rjes nor bu'i dkyil du 'dod bya ma lus par ni 'dod //
T02D1511:332b-40: de steng rtse mo'i mthar ni zhi ba mi rtog bzhin //
T02D1511:332b-41: gang yang lhan cig skyes rigs padmar gnas pa ston //
T02D1511:332b-42: zhes dga' ba'i dbye ba rtogs nas rang gis bon
T02D1511:332b-43: gyi 'od zer gyis bkug pa'i dpa' bo dang dpa'
T02D1511:333a-1: gyis brlabs pa'i lus bla mas kyang rgyal ba dpag
T02D1511:333a-2: tu med pa bcug pa dang ro gcig tu gyur
T02D1511:333a-4: de la dga' bral gyi dad po mchog dga'i tha
T02D1511:333a-5: ma de gnyis kyi bar gyi skad cig tu rig
T02D1511:333a-6: ma'i bde ba la ma ltos par ma nyams pa'i
T02D1511:333a-7: bde ba ste // gang la thog mtha' bar ma med //
T02D1511:333a-8: gzhan yang med cing rang yang med //
T02D1511:333a-9: srid dang mya ngan 'das pa med /
T02D1511:333a-10: 'di nyid bde ba chen po'i mchog / ces de
T02D1511:333a-11: kho na nyid bsam du med pa shes rab ye
T02D1511:333a-12: shes te g-yo ba med par 'gyur la nus pa
T02D1511:333a-13: ji lta bas bzung zhing nyams su myong bar gnas
T02D1511:333a-14: so // yang na btsan thabs kyis dpral bar drang ngo //
T02D1511:333a-15: ma nus na dal bus btang nas padma las lces
T02D1511:333a-16: blangs te de kho na nyid du bltas la dam
T02D1511:333a-17: tshig gi byang chub sems btung ngo zhes so //
T02D1511:333a-19: zab cing rgya che'i lam la lha mos la /
T02D1511:333a-20: tshig nyid kyi ni dbang bskur rin chen sbyin //
T02D1511:333a-22: bzhi pa de ni de bzhin no //
T02D1511:333a-23: zhes gsungs pas shes rab ye shes de nyid byang
T02D1511:333a-24: chub kyi sems kyi myu gu byung ba ni sgom
T02D1511:333a-25: pa rgyas par byed pa ni sgrib pa med pa
T02D1511:333a-26: gnas pa ni de kho na nyid chos thams cad
T02D1511:333a-27: bsam du med pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po'i
T02D1511:333a-28: bdag nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rang bzhin bzhi par
T02D1511:333a-29: brjod par bya'o dbang bzhi pa'o //
T02D1511:333a-30: zhi ba'i sbyin sreg byas nas rang dang slob ma la sogs pas dkyil 'khor mchod de //
T02D1511:333a-31: tshogs 'khor byas nas mtshan mo khyed kyis 'jug pa
T02D1511:333a-32: 'di bya ba 'di lta bu la yang smra par
T02D1511:333a-34: slob ma las yon blang bar bya zhing des kyang bu dang /
T02D1511:333a-38: sa gzhi la sogs pa ji ltar nus pa dbul lo //
T02D1511:333a-39: bla ma mnyes na dngos grub 'gyur //
T02D1511:333a-40: gzhan du min zhes thub pas gsungs //
T02D1511:333a-42: phyi rol du phyogs kyi gtor ma la sogs pa byas te nang du zhugs la phyag byas la /
T02D1511:333a-43: mchod yon la sogs pas mchod de /
T02D1511:333a-44: de las byung ba'i dge ba bsngos la bskor ba
T02D1511:333a-45: gsum byas te lho sgor yi ge brgya pa brjod
T02D1511:333a-47: khyed kyis sems can don kun mdzad//
T02D1511:333b-0: @333b ces pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D1511:333b-2: zhes pas ye shes 'khor lo gshegs su gsol te /
T02D1511:333b-3: dam tshig 'khor lo rang la bcug nas /
T02D1511:333b-4: chos thams cad skye ba med par ltag par mos shing dril bu dkrol te /
T02D1511:333b-5: lag pa na yod pa'i rdo rjes tshangs thig gi
T02D1511:333b-6: lam nas dkyil gyi bar du dbyi zhing rang gi
T02D1511:333b-7: mgo la rdul tshon cung zad tsam bcug la /
T02D1511:333b-8: padma la sogs pa dang sgo dang mtshams rnams dbye bar bya'o //
T02D1511:333b-9: zhi ba'i don du 'dod pa rnams la rdul tshon
T02D1511:333b-10: cung zad byin la rdul tshon gzhan ni rnam rgyal
T02D1511:333b-11: gyi bum par blugs la ras kyis brgyan pa dang
T02D1511:333b-13: rol mo la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas chu bo'i 'gram du 'dug ste /
T02D1511:333b-14: ba'i lci ba dang dri dkar pos mandala la padma'i
T02D1511:333b-15: lte bar bde mchog la snying po'i sngags kyis mchod
T02D1511:333b-16: nas 'dab ma rnams la klu brgyad de /
T02D1511:333b-17: de la shar du aom a'a: aa nna t'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-18: lhor aom a'a: padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-19: nub tu aom a'a: taksha k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-20: byang du aom a'a: b'a su k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-21: dbang ldan du aom a'a: ma h'a padm'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-22: mer aom a'a: sham kha p'a l'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-23: bden bral du aom a'a: ka rdo ta k'a ya h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D1511:333b-24: rlung du aom a'a: ku li k'a ya h'um sva h'a /
T02D1511:333b-25: zhes pa'i sngags rnams kyis me tog dkar po mchod
T02D1511:333b-26: la lag pa g-yon pa gdengs ka'i stangs dang g-yas
T02D1511:333b-27: pa brkyang ste / aom aa nanta p'a su ke /
T02D1511:333b-28: taksha ka ka rko ta padma ma h'a padma sham kha p'a la ku li ka /
T02D1511:333b-32: danda dha ra ma h'a danda dha ra /
T02D1511:333b-33: p'a l'a la hu lu ru nanda /
T02D1511:333b-34: s'a ga r'a ma h'a s'a ga r'a tapta /
T02D1511:333b-45: aom bhaksha bhaksha a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
T02D1511:333b-46: ma h'a n'a ga aa dhi pa ti sarba bhur bhu ba /
T02D1511:333b-47: phu phu sv'a h'a zhes brjod nas /
T02D1511:333b-48: gzhan rnams la yang 'o ma'i gtor ma rnams phul te /
T02D1511:333b-49: klu rnams la rngul tshon gtad la chur dor ro //
T02D1511:333b-50: de rnams kyis kyang bkur sti chen pos 'og tu drangs par bsam par bya'o //
T02D1511:334a-0: gang du rdul tshon khyer ba'i bum pa de chus bkang la de @334a * //
T02D1511:334a-1: bzhin du khyer te dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa la sogs pa la gtor par bya'o //
T02D1511:334a-2: der ba'i lci bas byugs la gzhon nu ma rnams la 'o thug gi ston mo bya'o //
T02D1511:334a-3: slob ma dbang bskur ba bzhin du lha'i rab gnas kyang shes par bya'o //
T02D1511:334a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje yis ;
T02D1511:334a-5: / cho ga sna tshogs las btus nas //
T02D1511:334a-7: sems can kun la phan par shog / dpal bde
T02D1511:334a-8: mchog 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rdzogs so
